Reviews.Title: Completely satisfied, very nice TV
Reviews.Author: digsblues
Reviews.Content: I love this TV, and you cannot beat the price. Like someone else said, the bezel is very thin, so the picture seems very large. I followed CajunJake's advice and ordered a $25. Cheetah wall mount. That came first and I installed in 15 minutes. When the TV came (quickly) I opened the box, put it in the wall mount, and turned it on. I was watching it immediately, and made no adjustments at all. The remote is easy to use. I'm not a techie at all and hate messing around with something to get it to work. This was fine for me, right out of the box.It has the usual inputs - audio/video, HDMI, USB and optical audio input.It has AV inputs and outputs, including one RF In for antenna or cable inputs, one AV In for audio and video input, two component inputs (one on the side and one on the rear of the television), one USB connector, one digital video out, one RS-232 connection, and one headphone output.The USB has limited use in that with other LG models one can insert a flash drive containing a movie and the LG plays the movie... but not with this model.. only view pictures and play music.. no movies... you need to run movies through a DVD or your computer..No VGA, but it has two HDMI and one USB port. Use the HDMI port from my laptop for connecting to the TV.It does not have an analog RCA output, but does have a digital optical output.Also has a sleep timer.The picture quality is excellent, and the sound is great, too. I like it so well, I'm ordering another one for a different room, before the price goes up.ETA - 4/28/2014 I've had this 9 months now, and haven't had any problems. I bought a second one, and it's great, too. Great value for the price.The TV does not come with an HDMI cable, but the Cheetah mount I bought does have one included.Thanks for taking the time to read my review, and I hope you found it helpful in making a purchase decision.

Reviews.Title: As always, LG delivers!
Reviews.Author: Ranger "Happy Retiree"
Reviews.Content: LG has come through again!  I already have a 42" LCD HDTV and wanted a smaller one for my "man cave".  Of course I ordered from Amazon and it arrived right on time, as always is the case with Amazon.  This 32" model delivers a HD picture using the entire screen.  LG's are the easiest on the market to set up every single adjustment you might want to make.  This one is a little newer, and has even more adjustments.  If you click 4 for channel 4, it offers 5 other options of the over the air numbers, 4.1, 4.2, etc!  I love it and will buy any product available made by LG.  This company has proven it over and over.  You won't be sorry!

Reviews.Title: Excellent 720p television for the price!
Reviews.Author: Paul S. Remington
Reviews.Content: The LG 32LN53OB is a 32" LED television designed for those who are satisfied with 720p video output without the 1080p price.  It contains a nice selection of built-in features and picture modes and is Energy Star compliant.  Its price point is a nice selling feature, but this doesn't detract from its video performance, which is respectable.  With all this stated, the LG 32LN53OB is a lower scale television in terms of video specifications.  If you're in the market for a 720p, lower priced television, the LG 32LN53OB is certainly worth looking at.The LG 32LN53OB screen measures 31.5" diagonally.  It has a refresh rate of 60 Mhz with video processing that enhances video performance.  60 MHz is fine for slower moving video, but will result in pixelization during fast action scenes.  To add to video performance, LG has incorporated its Triple XD Engine, which provides video deinterlacing, color and contrast enhancements, and video noise reduction.  This adds to the overall image quality.The 32LN53OB comes with seven picture modes that preset different video aspect ratios.  These presets enable 16:9 widescreen imaging without any scaling.  This preserves the sharpness of the original video signal, which can be degraded during scaling.  Other aspect ratios are supported by internal scaling, which enables these video modes to utilize as much of the screen as possible.To assist in setting up the television, LG has supplied a Picture Wizard that assists in configuring critical settings that control picture quality.  These settings include adjustments to black level, white level, color, color tint, horizontal sharpness, and vertical sharpness.  These are all easily set using the Picture Wizard in only a few minutes.The 32LN53OB supports a number of AV inputs and outputs, including one RF In for antenna or cable inputs, one AV In for audio and video input, two component inputs (one on the side and one on the rear of the television), one USB connector, one digital video out, one RS-232 connection, and one headphone output.As is typical with LED televisions, the audio quality is not its most impressive feature, although it does a very nice job.  Many televisions are a bit anemic in their audio output.  Not with this LG television.  The 32LN53OB comes with two 10W speakers that provide a nice volume depth.  If you want to listen to the news while in the next room, you'll have no problem increasing the volume to a level that enables you to do that comfortably.  Some televisions provide only a 3W speaker, which doesn't provide enough power to fill up more than a room's worth of volume.  While the television provides a nice amount of volume, don't expect it to deliver grinding bass or nice low end.  For that, you'll want to install an A/V system with larger speakers.Power consumption is quite modest with this television, which has earned it an Energy Star rating.  It consumes a scant 28.9W of power during typical use.  Standby mode uses only .3W.The 32LN53OB comes with a swivel stand, a standard remote, two AA batteries for the remote, and a one-year parts and labor warranty.The 32LN53OB is a very good 32" LED television, for the money.  It contains the right amount of features and performance to satisfy most consumers who are looking for a basic television at a nice price.  It doesn't natively support 1080p video reproduction, but the video processors within the television do a nice job of hosting 1080 content.  The television also offers a very nice array of features and connectivity options, which makes the 32LN53OB a viable option for a variety of applications.Overall, the LG 32LN53OB is a nice television worth considering for those looking at 720p LED televisions.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: E. Barber "Beth"
Reviews.Content: As a techie, buying a cheaper off-brand before and realizing you do need a warranty for this type of purchase. I have been pleasantly surprised with LG brands. I had a great cell phone from them and now after testing their product out, the clarity and sturdiness of the products is good branding. I wanted a good TV for my PS3 so I could play my Skyrim video game, I can actually read the signs on the game when my character is running down the roads on the game! Fantastic compared to the last 32" TV I bought last year that blew a fuse within the 90 days. I am watching this Netlix show and I am just amazed with the clarity. Great gaming, Netflix, Youtube viewing and...the sound is great for a small bedroom (I'm on a lower setting for the room 14 level and it's not even a quarter up the volume level). Good stuff, thank you LG for helping me get my video game action on during my school break and yes, when I play video games it's all for research :)

Reviews.Title: Oustanding Basic Features 32 INCH LED TV
Reviews.Author: cajunjake
Reviews.Content: Wanted a basic features 32 Inch Flat Panel TV for a home office (and wanted a LCD since they are lighter to mount to the wall). I have toyed around in the past by purchasing 3 cheap Flat panel TV's from best buy (two Insignia's (24 and 32 inch) and 1 Dynex (26 inch) thinking that all "cheap" TV's would be on par with each other. This LG costs about $50 more than a comparable 32 inch Insignia, however, I believe the cost difference is well worth the money.The cheap Insignia's and the Dynex have issues with the HD tuner - they always have issues whenever I turn to a HD Channel - I normally need to go up or down one station, and manually turn back to the station that I want to get a signal lock, then, once s a signal lock is obtained, I will usually lose that station after about 30 minutes - these issues are NOT present on the LG.Pro's of LG over cheap brands:  - Better picture quality;  - Better HD tuner  - Better Build qualityCon's: About $50 more than a comparable el cheapo TV (however, in my opinion it appears the extra money is worth it)This TV is recommended if you are in the market for a "basic features" 32 inch TV (this TV is a "no frills" model).  Good overall picture, and sound (comes with 2 speakers rated at 10 watts each). VESA mount 200 x 100 mm (I also purchased from amazon, a Cheetah TV mount ($25) to mount this TV to the wall - very easy procedure.

Reviews.Title: No headphone jack and USB limited use
Reviews.Author: Dean "Dean"
Reviews.Content: Based upon reviews and friends who own LG TV's I bought this model and brand. All things being great.. BUT...1) the USB has limited use in that with other LG models one can insert a flash drive containing a movie and the LG plays the movie... but not with this model.. I can only view pictures and play music.. no movies... you need to run movies through a DVD or your computer.. this is way less convenient. I am not sure why other LG models offer this but this model does not.2) Based upon reviews stating this model includes an output for a headphone... it does not...I suppose reviews are what they are and they are mostly customers opinions and judgements...Overall I would not purchase this TV again... I will purchase the LG brand again... I have had years of use from my LG phones and other LG brand products and I have confidence the 32LN530B will give me years of service with awesome picture quality.I am disappointed in the reviews and the capabilities of this TV.UPDATE !  I was informed that I can use the Digital Audio Output jack for a set of headphones via a new cable... I will try this... I am still upset the USB isn't able to play movies..

Reviews.Title: Good Bang For You Buck
Reviews.Author: Shawn M Gallup
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV recently to replace a slowly dying 5 year old Vizio TV in our bedroom. Yes I said 5 year old Vizio. Anyhow when we started shopping for a TV this one made the short list a long aside a Sony Bravia, and Toshiba. This TV got slightly better reviews and was in the same price range as the other two. The main appeal to this TV was the smaller sized frame. However the picture is incredibly beautiful and crystal clear. The one feature that is taking me time to adjust to (and it can be turned off) is the way the TV will adjust to the amount of light in the room. I am a night owl so I am usually up later than my wife. When all the lights are out in the bedroom the TV becomes very dim which is good for my wife because the light doesn't keep her awake - however the dimmer screen does take a little time to get used to. If you don't like this feature you can shut it off in the menu. I read the remote was hard to work with - I have not experienced this at all. For the price and what we were looking for it's perfect.So far I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for a good quality fairly priced 720p TV for their bedroom, kids room, or where ever.

Reviews.Title: Very surprised and happy with this TV!
Reviews.Author: Alex Bruno
Reviews.Content: I was nervous when ordering this TV because everyone always finds something negative with anything they buy and I didn't want to be bothered returning a TV. I myself am not a videophile, so the highest of quality isn't a huge deal for me. I absolutely LOVE this TV. For a lower end model with no frills, I think it's absolutely perfect. Upon watching a show on Netflix, I will admit it is a little darker than I'd like, but once I switched it from eco to standard, the color looked good. Sound seems to be a huge issue for people with lower end TVs and I think the speakers on this one are pretty loud and I'm satisfied with them.My only complaint is the stand is slightly difficult to put together and screw into the TV. YOu have to really twist hard on the screwdriver, (unless you have a drill). Also, the TV feels a little shaky in the stand, but upon checking other TVs in the house, of all different brands, that seems to be common with these stands.All in all I'm very satisfied with this television, and if it doesn't break randomly for no reason in the near future, I'll definitely buy LG again!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: D. Fokema
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv for the money. Have not spent any time adjusting picture, looks good with no adjustments. Would highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Fantastic 32" LG LED TV
Reviews.Author: White Sox Fan
Reviews.Content: I already own a 50" LG plasma TV and have been completely satisified with it. My next TV purchase was going to be a 32" TV for the bedroom and knew that I'd stick with the LG brand. Since I only watch broadcast and streaming, the 720p suits my needs.My big leap of faith was buying a TV online from Amazon. The concern I had was damage in shipping and then the need to return it. I went ahead with the Amazon purchase and could not be more pleased with the speed of delivery, condition of the package and certainly the easy setup, outstanding picture, sound and overall quality of this 32LN530B LG LED TV. This TV received excellent reviews on Amazon, which also helped me with my purchase decision.If you're looking for a quality 32" TV at a very reasonable cost, there is no reason to look any further.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Slim Chance
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for a friend that needed something in this size range.  Haven't spent a lot of face time with it, but the picture looked better out of the box than the 40" 5000 series by Samsung, from what I recall (another purchase for a relative) which is not bad; in other words, the PQ on this is very good.  Attractive thin bezel. 2013 model made in Mexico, not China.

Reviews.Title: Great TV : well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Jodi1953
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a decent picture and speakers with a barely audible sound.To my surprise the clarity and color is razor sharp and the sound superb! This is my first LG and I am more than satisfied.The online customer reviews were more than accurate.All, at a price I could not obtain locally and w/  amazon prime delivered to my door-step!

Reviews.Title: Good TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Laurie B.
Reviews.Content: Need I say more? Perfect replacement for 20 year old TV in the bedroom.  Nice picture.  Easy setup. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great product for someone not so techno-savvy
Reviews.Author: Susan G. Corp "Choral Witch"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture and sound. Easy to set up.Looks sleek and professional in my home. This product was recommended to me from in industry insider who is a techno-geek. He was right!

Reviews.Title: BEWARE *** MAY LAST ONLY DAYS ***
Reviews.Author: Paul L. Parker
Reviews.Content: STOP ~ RUN the other way from this TV.  Picture went completely black on the 33rd day of use.  This TV was only used to watch news broadcasts at meal time.  Obtaining repair service under warranty is a problem.  Once I was able to speak with a repair service center I learned that the parts are not in stock to repair the TV.  Looks like it will take a week to get this TV fixed.  We have numerous TV's in our house and have never had one go bad.  I will NEVER buy an LG product again!  Service Tech arrived with the new parts ordered by Best Services and installed.  TV not repaired.  Additional parts ordered.  Service Tech arrived for a second visit with more new parts and installed, TV not repaired.  I called Customer Service and explained I was a Totally Dissatisfied Customer, they could care less.  More parts to be ordered and a third service visit.  This is the worst customer service ever.

Reviews.Title: Simplicity
Reviews.Author: Neil & Tera Arthur
Reviews.Content: I've been involved in ordering or specifying and installing four different sets in the past 6 months, and this one was, by far, the easiest to install and get working.  My 80-year-old mother is the primary user, so simplicity was a must.  She's happy and that means we're all happy!

Reviews.Title: when working , this is a nice tv
Reviews.Author: bobby taylor
Reviews.Content: ok, i have had mine for about 7 months now, my first problem began in the 4th month, the tv , for no apparent reason would just turm itself off, after a while it would just come back on and sometimes would stay on for hours and sometimes not. i emailed LG and was told to check the sleep timer and pull it away from the wall a little, which i did and it worked. apparently the tv has to be further away from the wall than the 4 inches i had it. on now to the 5th month, now when i turn it on sound is all i get, no picture for anywhere from 1 or 2 minutes up to 8 or 10 minutes, this goes on for a while and my wife discovers if you tap the unit on the rear the picture will come on. well, i shoot off  another email to LG and the response was to check my picture settings among several other things, as if we had changed them to the point where the picture would only come on with a tap to the case,come on folks, this is a bedroom only tv which we watch before going to bed at night. we have not adjusted anything since we have had it. so, now i call the number on the email for customer service, tell the guy i have done all the checks the problem is just getting worse.  he told me that he would submit my request for service and if it was approved i would get a call from someone in a few days. well, my request apparently wasn't approved because it's been a month and still no call. i just sent my 4th request for service, fingers crossed.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: tammee
Reviews.Content: this tv quit working 2 months after I bought it. TV would turn off and screen would flash.  I cannot power off the TV unless its unplugged

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Laverne J. Bernard "Mimi Bernard"
Reviews.Content: It is all I desired and more.  Excellent electronic item for the money.  Shipped exactly as promised and received on the date promised.  As usual Amazon always comes through with the best of everything.

Reviews.Title: Minor flaw--for Me Anyway
Reviews.Author: John Tremain
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty nice TV with good performance and a great picture and sound.It does offer a marvelous array of options to work the screen size and picture adjustments.The sound adjustments are remarkable--and the sound is good--at least for a bedroom where I use it.BUT--it has one flaw. I have both cable service and also I have an antenna coming in. This is the ONLY TV I have (and I have many) that DOES NOT ALLOW you to scan and store both the antenna channels and the cable channels and switch between the two when desired on the TV menu. You CAN have two inputs into the single connection by switching--but you can't have two signal sources stored.I decided to keep it--after a couple of days of usage--I like the picture quality and the way it works that much. I will have to diddle with switching to my over-the-air tuning from time-to-time--BUT--I decided I really only use that if the cable goes on the fritz for a while--my reason for installing an antenna anyway.All-in all--I can recommend this TV--my particular gripe probably does not probably affect many others who might choose it.

Reviews.Title: Our Third LG TV Purchase
Reviews.Author: 999 haunts
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd LG TV purchase over the course of four years. This unit was for a bedroom, so we didn't need a huge screen. Set up was very simple, as it has been with each of the LG's. We love the picture on this and the other TV's. It has two HDMI outlets, which is fine for a bedroom TV. We actually only use a Roku with this unit. Honestly, I give all our LG TV's 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LN530B Great for the money!
Reviews.Author: Bussmoover
Reviews.Content: Wanted to give this 5 stars but could not.  It is a 720p / 60Hz LED TV at a great price from LG. So, the 4 star rating reflects what it is as a TV.  If you were expecting perfection, you should spend at least twice as much and get a 1080p / 120Hz.As a bedroom TV (which is what I bought it for), it is 5 stars.  Two HDMI ports, great color, good clarity, good sound, ease of set up, time on/off settings, great price/value, delivered to my door by Amazon and backed by Amazon return policy, LG warranty and Square Trade warranty (extra cost).  It is interesting that on the LG site this is described as a bedroom TV.  LG knows best!The cons are:  1.  Motion blurring.  If this was my primary TV for watching sports action, I probably would choose to spend more for 120Hz.  At 60Hz blurring occurs.  Eventually the brain gets in sync and you can watch sports without this being an irritant.  It just takes a few minutes.  For casual watching of routine TV viewing, it is fine.  2.  Field of View.  Within about 15-20 degrees on either side of straight on viewing, the picture is perfect.  Move further left or right from this and the color starts to fade and becomes white.  For perspective,  if you have a couch positioned eight feet away directly in front of the TV, anyone sitting on the couch will have the best picture.  Imagine the cone created from the center of the TV to the ends of the couch.  Anyone viewing outside of this cone will have a diminished picture.  All of these measurements are approximate and you can position the TV to maximize viewing based on audience placement.Make sure you use an HDMI cable from the cable box to the TV.  I tried it first with a regular cable and the HD picture was comparable to the picture on the analog TV being replaced.  Got an HDMI cable free from my cable provider, and the HD picture changed to amazing.Would I buy it again knowing its limitations?  Absolutely!  It is great price/value.Update after 3 months use.  I find I prefer this TV now over others in the house.  The picture viewed straight on is incredible.  Vivid, consistent, true color is its strength.  Also, the picture is crisp, consistently showing a pleasing picture and showing background detail not found on my other HDTV's.  As to the motion blurring - either the TV has gotten better processing motion or the brain has gotten better at processing because I no longer notice it.  I would give this a 4.5 rating after using it for 3 months.  The only con being the field of view which continues the same.And for those owners complaining of the TV turning itself off - turn off the power saver option on the TV menu and, if you are using a cable box with a power save option, turn off the power save option on the cable box menu also.

Reviews.Title: ... HDTV in our family room and have been very happy with the LG product so bought this for our ...
Reviews.Author: P. A. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: We have a 50" LG HDTV in our family room and have been very happy with the LG product so bought this for our bedroom. Set up was easy: connected to an HD satellite box and set up the HD box remote - good to go. Sound is fine for bedroom viewing. Stand is not adjustable so we did have to buy a monitor stand to get the TV up off the small table it's sitting on so we could view when lying in bed. Paid $218 (Nov 2013) with free shipping so got a good deal and very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: ALApat
Reviews.Content: My TV arrived on time and in good shape.  It was a second LG TV and I can't say enough about the quality of the set for a secondary TV.  I am not a tech savvy person as far as knowing "perfection" on the technical side but this television for my use is just perfect.  The box arrived in great shape and it was easy to set up right out of the box.  Good TV for the money!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Steven Levin
Reviews.Content: Perfect for master bedroom.  Great picture and features, sound quality is also good.  Highly recommended for anyone not looking to drop a ton of cash.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Daniel G. Paquin
Reviews.Content: I like the TV for picture quality and ease of setup.  Was not difficult to program.  If I have one criticism it would be the screen that is like a window finish and shows lots of reflections.  If the sun is shinning on the screen you need to close the shade or your viewing is not possible.  Great for dark rooms with little outside light.

Reviews.Title: The 32LN520B has NO audio out (no line out, no fiber out, no headphone out, NOTHING)
Reviews.Author: Jeff Latus
Reviews.Content: I was under the impression this TV had an audio out. It does not. It is almost worthless to me without an audio out in some form or another and I would have returned it but I discarded the box and already had the VESA mounts on before I realized it.

Reviews.Title: please buy. its a best buy
Reviews.Author: Carlene Baptiste
Reviews.Content: i brought this tv for my sons' roomam jealous cause it shows better than mineam still rocking LCDso i think am gonna upgradelove it would recommend

Reviews.Title: Great!...Unless you want to wall-mount it
Reviews.Author: David H Bolen
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV as a 2nd TV for the bedroom. It looks great, the sound on its built-in speakers is impressive, and even the one-button controller under the screen is clever.Then, we decided to wall-mount it. It will only accommodate a 200 x 100 VESA mount because of a couple of bezels on the rear of the TV won't let anything else lie flat. I eventually had to put spacers between the mount and the TV and even then had to fabricate something that wouldn't sit up against the curved bezel on the back of the TV.If you are planning on buying this TV and plan on wall-mounting it, buy its younger brother - the 530B. It has a flat back and can be mounted in minutes. (maybe this is why it was discontinued).

Reviews.Title: picture is great
Reviews.Author: Bree Shakespeare
Reviews.Content: I bought this based on other reviews.  I'm not disappointed in the picture or the size but the sound isn't as good as I would have  expected based on the reviews i've read. I have a small bedroom and I have to turn this Tv up to half way to even hear it across the room.  I bought this Tv to replace a samsung Tv the picture quality is definately worth it but sound quality is definately questionable.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: C Flyer
Reviews.Content: Very nice television, great picture.  No problems assembling or setting up.  A HDMI cable is needed to get best picture.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv
Reviews.Author: MARJORIE NIEVES
Reviews.Content: Excellent tv, better than expected, 100% recommended, looks great on my xbox, blueray video.I plan to buy another in the future.

Reviews.Title: Good price, works well for a second TV
Reviews.Author: T. Eicher "TImtheviking"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to go in my bedroom, and I have been generally pleased with the picture quality and features so far. It's a low-end model without any smart features that you might expect from a high-end set, but paired with my Chromecast, it gets the job done, and I feel it was good deal for the money.One drawback I did not realize when I made the purchase: the set is listed as having a USB port, which it does, but it does not support the playback of video files from a flash drive, only image and audio files.  The technical specs on the LG website do, indeed,  list only image and audio formats, unlike the pricier sets, which support DivX, MPEG, etc. This isn't a deal-breaker for me, and it's simple enough to work around, with a laptop connected via HDMI, for example, but I do wish the tech specs made this fact clearer, as I might have considered looking for a set that did have video playback capability.

Reviews.Title: BUY THIS TV
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: I BUY A LOT OF STUFF FROM AMAZON, AND RARELY GIVE REVIEWS, BUT I'M SO PLEASED WITH THIS TV, I AM WRITING ONE NOW. BUY THIS TV. ITS VERY LIGHT WEIGHT, UNDER 15 POUNDS. THE PICTURE AND SOUND ARE GREAT. I JUST BOUGHT ANOTHER ONE FOR MY BROTHER TODAY. I KNOW HE'S GOING TO LOVE IT TOO. THE FIRST LG TV I EVER BOUGHT WAS A 47 INCH FOR THE LIVING ROOM, THEN ANOTHER FOR THE BEDROOM. AFTER THAT I BOUGHT A 55 INCH SANYO FOR THE BASEMENT, BECAUSE IT WAS CHEAPER THAN THE LG.  B I G, B I G,  MISTAKE! YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR, AND THE PRICE DIFFERENCE ISN'T REALLY THAT ASTRONOMICAL. NEVER AGAIN WILL I TRY TO SAVE A BUCK THAT WAY. IT IS'NT WORTH IT. YOU LIVE WITH YOUR TV EVERY DAY, AND NOW I'M STUCK WITH IT. AFTER HAVING BOUGHT 4 LG TVS, I CAN TELL YOU I'VE NEVER HAD A PROBLEM WITH ANY OF THEM. DON'T BOTHER BUYING THE EXTENDED WARRANTY. YOU WON'T EVER NEED IT WITH AN LG!  JOHN G., CONNECTICUT

Reviews.Title: Dead on arrival
Reviews.Author: Michael L
Reviews.Content: Waste of time since the picture only came on for a few seconds and now the power light indicator won't even stay on. Amazon Warehouse Deals gets a miss here also, they did not check the item, and they won't do an exchange like they say. http://www.amazon.com/gp/aag/details?ie=UTF8&asin;=&isAmazonFulfilled;=&isCBA;=&marketplaceID;=ATVPDKIKX0DER&orderID;=&seller;=AF42IM5NF18DF&sshmPath;=privacy-policy#customAt least the customer service on the return was nice. Just a hassle to order and return a dead item.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Excellent Picture, excellent sound, nicely designed and sturdily built.Being new to HDTV, I was initially concerned about buying a 720p as opposed to a 1080p, butthe difference is indistinguishable.If you are looking for value, here it is.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, Great price. If you're considering a budget friendly 32-inch TV This is it!
Reviews.Author: Christopher M. Lindfield
Reviews.Content: I bought the 32LN520B on a Lightning Deal around Black Friday and got an OUTSTANDING Deal, I would recommend this LED for someone who's looking for something that cheap but performs well and doesn't need 1080p.Pros- Great picture quality, after calibration the black levels were surprisingly decent, colors were still vivid, and the picture is a bit sharper. i do recommend cranking the brightness/backlight way down-Easy to set up, Mine came missing screws ( I will find a wall-mount anyway ) Pretty much turn on and go, if you're not trying to set up antenna.-Extremely lightweight and fairly thinCons- All though the picture looks terrific for this price/size, my panel does experience some flash lighting in the top left and right corners- Came without screws!-Sound is meh, but that's about every flat panel these days.- A major con for some but not for me, Is no smart features. But if you're looking for a budget TV going with a non smart tv and going with a Roku box is usually cheaper, and Roku will typically have more content and work a bit better.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, Nice price.  Nice dealing with Amazon.
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Nice TV, I like it very much.  Its very light compared to the 32 inch lcd it is replacing.  It's so light that it can be hung like a picture on the wall.  The USB port only plays pics and music, no video.  I connected a 1 TB hard drive to it and it worked no problem.  I bought a HDMI card for my Desktop PC and it works great for watching movies from the computer.  The TV only has one HDMI connector so that may be a problem for some.  The TV does have a very glossy screen but  It has not been a problem for me.  It has a auto brightness feature that dims the picture when I turn the lights off.  Not many bells and whistles but as most of the reviews state, It has a very good picture.  The Tv tuner seems to be a pretty good one.  I only use an antenna for TV and it works as good or better than the other digital tuners I have used.  The power supply is external, its in the power cord like a laptop.  That's good if it ever needs replacing.  I have had it for a week or so and I am glad I got it.  After I bought it,  it went on sale!  No problem,  one click on my orders page and Amazon refunded me the difference.  NICE!!!!!!!!!!  Didn't have to talk to anyone or any fuss at all.  Just pasted the link to the new price and they put $30 back on the card I used to buy it.

Reviews.Title: love my tv
Reviews.Author: Norma
Reviews.Content: this tv is perfect for my small living room.  it was easy to hook up and get streaming and I love it.  good price

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Robert Mason
Reviews.Content: I needed a 32 inch TV to replace a Samsung that had suffered a catastrophic "stain" of some sort across a quarter of the screen.  I decided on the LG after reading the reviews here.  This set exceeds my expectations.  I won't repeat most of what others have already said.  I mainly want to say that the set was easy to set up.  I wasn't overly happy with either the color or the sound using the default settings on either.  A few trips through the available color and sound choices provided settings that I am very happy with.  The sound quality is far better than I expected.  You don't have to worry about booming base breaking any windows in your house, but the audio is clean and clear.  It even sounds very good when listening to the cable music channels.The only thing that comes close to being a negative point is that the stand seems a bit flimsy.  I may think about going to a wall mount (but will probably never get around to doing so).

Reviews.Title: Good enough for the bedroom. Good enough for the price.
Reviews.Author: justsomeguy
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for my old TV I had in my bedroom.  I was contemplating buying a schmancy TV that had web access, etc, but I'm glad I went with a basic flat screen like this instead.  I just wanted something I can use to flip channels real quick.  This works, pretty much.First, it's cheap.  I spent just over 200 bucks for this I think.  That's $100 more than the older smaller flat screen TV I had in my bedroom which wasn't even HD capable.  So the price is great.Second, the viewing angle is OK.  If you're a stickler for viewing angle, don't get this TV.  Unless you're watching it head-on, as soon as you move to the left or right, the picture dims.  That's annoying.  But, like I said, this is just sitting in the bedroom so that's OK by me.  Also, it was cheap.Third, yes the sound isn't the greatest but - for a bedroom it's fine.  If you're a stickler for awesome sound this is not the TV for you.Fourth, I only needed this to scan and save the channels it picked up from my cable line which it did just fine.  But it organized them in a weird way.  First, it has a bunch of channels labeled "CATV" meaning Cable TV I guess.  Those number like 2 - 48.  Then it has some "CADTV" or some other label and it's like HD channels from the cable provider.  Those are like 5-101 but they come AFTER the 2-48 mentioned before.  THEN, there's a THIRD category called "DTV" or something?  Like digital TV I guess?  Another set of channel numbers.  It also picked up a lot of "blank" screens as channels.  I think it picked up the menu options from Time Warner and saved them as channels (101-1, 101-2, etc).  It did pick up a ton of channels, but many of them are these "blank" ones.  Plus, it's slow to change channels - I like to flip really quick but you can't do that anymore - these new TVs or even the cable boxes are just slow to do that.  Drives me nuts.But overall I am happy with it. It's nice and big for a bedroom, looks OK, the HD programs look really nice.  Lots of video and sound options.  It's cheap.  I'm glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Patrick Carson "nomad"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV at a great price.  I've always had success with LG products, so I felt comfortable ordering this set. It exceeded my expectations, both in picture quality and sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Sharon R. Dranow
Reviews.Content: My new tv has a great, sharp, clear picture!  I am very happy with it.  The sound, however, has a somewhat "tinny" sound to it, perhaps because it simulates surround sound.  I currently have the set in a very large room, which may account for some of that.  I will be moving it to the bedroom in two months when I purchase a larger TV for the family room, and I may have a different perception of the quality of sound.  I would definitely recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: Janice Sanders
Reviews.Content: This tv is nice I put this one in my bedroom, I would like a bigger one for my living room. It has good picture quality. I would recommend this product to others.

Reviews.Title: We like the TV so much we bought a second one today!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Our TV died unexpectively so we were not in the market by choice.  In reading other comments it seems that this model is considered more of a secondary TV.  At the time I was happy with the price as well as the LG brand. We set the TV (55 inch) up in our family room and are extremely happy with it. So happy that we bought a second TV (32 inch) for my husband's office/den today on Amazon.  We replaced all of our kitchen appliances with LG over a year ago and like the brand.  We have only had the TV for 3-4 months but so far are extremely happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: LG TV Electronics
Reviews.Author: Cindy Weatherford
Reviews.Content: 6 months after purchases the TV it started turning it self off, and now it won't even turn on.  I contacted Amazon about returning the TV, they transfer my message to the company the tv came from, they will not let me return the tv. I definately wouldn't recommend anyone to buy a LG TV.  So I'm stuck with a $200 or more $, TV that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good screen resolution
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Nunez
Reviews.Content: I like this TV and recommend it to your room, it is very cheap. It has a good menu, easy to understand in your language

Reviews.Title: Comment on features
Reviews.Author: Patrica A Huffman
Reviews.Content: Clear picture.  Quality of sound better than my last T V.  Slow response in changing channels.  "Info" shows what is playing, but does not show what is on next.  I have another T V that has automatic closed caption with the mute feature.

Reviews.Title: I definitely recomment this tv
Reviews.Author: Barry Silverstein
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV and Amazon did a great job getting it to me.the picture and audio is really good with HD

Reviews.Title: A terrific value for a high quality TV
Reviews.Author: Mary Simpson
Reviews.Content: We love it. The picture is clear and the color true.I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a new TV

Reviews.Title: Decent television for wall mounting in a bedroom
Reviews.Author: J. Braby
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent television for use on a wall mount in a bedroom. I would not use this television in your primary viewing space, but it is an excellent secondary television.The Good:It's very light.Very reasonable price for its feature set.Very good size if you just want a television for occasional viewing in the bedroom (or in the kitchen I suppose).No 3d to drive up cost, and 720p60 support.The Bad:"Only" 2 HDMI inputs. In my case this covers the TiVo and AppleTV, and I don't really need another HDMI in.Colors tend to wash out when viewed off axis. While expected for an LCD/LED panel, this monitor seems to exhibit color fade more than other panels I have seen.Blacks are not as dark as I would like.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Laurie Lewis
Reviews.Content: We got this tv for our den for grand kids and guests.....Very easy set up and very nice picture.  The sound could be a little better, but great tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Sanibelgirl
Reviews.Content: This is a good product. We bought it for our mom. She's older and needed something more compact and easy to manipulate.She has that with this compact tv. Not fancy-schmanzy. It's all good.

Reviews.Title: LG tv
Reviews.Author: BIGTIME
Reviews.Content: This tv is the best 32 inch out there...great color and good sound and plenty of setting to fit your needs

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Bowen
Reviews.Content: Perfect TV and great picture and sound. Easy set up took just about 20 minutes to attach stand and set channels. I finally have a TV I can see and the picture is great.

Reviews.Title: good picture and sound
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: Not hard for this Luddite to set up with an antenna but I miss thorough preview info like my analog TV it replaced.

Reviews.Title: It replaced my son's old 27" when it finally died...
Reviews.Author: av.online
Reviews.Content: My son couldnt love it more.  With the orientation of his hold tv with the speakers on the side, this actually provides a way larger screen for the same amount of desk space.  The picture quality going from an old tube tv, to an actual HD is night and day.  We bought the 47" LG (5400 model), at the same time and the 32" is every bit as good (and in some ways better).  End of the day, its a TV, it does exactly what its supposed to do while exceeding our expectations in every way for the price.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: Pedro Marrero
Reviews.Content: excellent tv, very good picture and best of all is the priceI have not had any inconvenience with the TV so far was very easy to install

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: M. Michele Pearson "irishluck"
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for our needs. It is in our living room and we use it for Wii and watching Netflix. This tv suits our needs and works well.

Reviews.Title: LG 32' TV
Reviews.Author: david n
Reviews.Content: Television was easy to set up and use.  Very good picture for the money.  Manufacturer's information on dimensions includes border around TV.  Actual screen size is about 1' smaller on each border.

Reviews.Title: Picture is great, sound leaves something to be desired. Dims when lights are low?
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: While we were very excited for our first LG TV, I have to say I'm a little disappointed.The picture is great, but the sound drives me absolutely insane. It sounds muted, and no amount of adjusting does the trick. And with no 3.5mm Headphone jack, I can't hook this TV up to our soundbar. We must purchase a $45 converter to plug our soundbar into the digital optical audio input on the TV.We called LG about this and were pretty much shoo'd off the phone. They could care less.Also, we noticed that when the lights are out, the TV dims darker...? I've never seen such a thing. If the lights are off in a room, and you turn on this TV, it starts out bright as normal. but within about 30 seconds you can physically see it start to dim down to be darker. I don't understand why. This doesn't happen when the lights are on or it is during the day.Overall, I think we're going to take this TV back. Our Hisense that we had before this one was so much better.

Reviews.Title: Once you understand the TV settings - it's a good one
Reviews.Author: D. Schenberg
Reviews.Content: I do like this TV in our bedroom but watch out for the auto brightness settings. It may cause your picture to be a little more dim that you'd prefer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Works great.  It was rated pretty well by Consumer Reports and we found that it really is a nice TV.

Reviews.Title: nice tele
Reviews.Author: E. Cimmino
Reviews.Content: good picture, and better volume than I have come to expect. I have surround sound systems on two other televisions, but this is in my bedroom - didn't want to have to go there again, and I didn't so thanks LG

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Xiaoxia Shi "xiaoxia"
Reviews.Content: works great. Nothing to complain. I use it with a roku 3 to watch Youtube and Chinese TV shows. Everything is crisp clear. Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics LN530B 32LN530B 32-Inch LED-lit 720p 60Hz TV
Reviews.Author: Charles J "biker dad"
Reviews.Content: Been using this for about a month in an exercise room...the picture is clear and the sound (for a TV) is good and I like the fact that it uses so little power to operate  It is light so using a swing arm wall mount is not an issue.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT, NICE PICTURE, SOUND IS PERFECT FOR ME.
Reviews.Author: Raymond D. Kowalewski
Reviews.Content: I GAVE THIS TV A FOUR STAR RATING JUST BECAUSE I HAVE NOTHING TO COMPARE IT TO. THIS IS MY FIRST REAL HD TV. PICTURE IS VERY GOOD AFTER ADJUSTING TO MY LIKING. I WAS WORRIED ABOUT THE SOUND I HAVE TROUBLE HEARING SOME TV'S, BUT AFTER ADJUSTING IT IS PERFECT FOR ME. USED FOR THREE MONTHS NO TROUBLE SO FAR. A HDMI CABLE CONNECTION TO CABLE BOX IS A MUST FOR THE BEST PICTURE.

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I know it was not very expensive, but this tv fell well below my expectations. The color is a little washed out around the edges and the images are just not that crisp and clear. There are many options to enhance the image but I feel this is just a smokescreen to cover the lack of quality this tv really has. I should have done a little more research into LED and LCD tvs before I chose this one. At one point and I do not remember which one of the various "enhancements" for viewing that are available, when the image moved on the screen it was as if it was made of little pixels grouped in a swarm as you may view in a large gathering of starlings when they congregate in the evening and create some discernible image playing catch up with itself as it moves from place to place in the sky.I thought I could get use to the characteristics of this tv but we have a large cathode ray tv in the living room with the same screen size and it delivers a better and brighter image.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Good TV
Reviews.Author: shovenose
Reviews.Content: While originally intended to replace a family member's old 22" Samsung LCDTV (no HDMI, Broken base so it was leaning against the wall, missing remote) they decided this one was "too big" so I have an extra TV sitting around - oh well, I can wall-mount it above my bed or bring it to my office, no problem...I did attach it to my computer and watch some Netflix, before I did watch about half a DVD on it. Here's my experience:-Very nice on screen menu interface and plenty of options.-Well laid out remote-Generally decent looking TV. Wish the base was square, though...-2 HDMI ports. One on back and one on side. Would have liked to have 1 or 2 more-Mediocre sound.However, it still deserves all five stars, because the shortcomings are expected of a low cost TV, and this unit is competitively priced, actually lower than some of the generic units with similar specs.If you would notice the difference in picture qaulity (I would, but most people wouldn't), or would use it as a computer monitor, spend a bit more and get a 1080P TV. But this is a high quality, affordable option that you won't regret**not guaranteed :)

Reviews.Title: Bad television was not happy with the product
Reviews.Author: sean robertson
Reviews.Content: The tv started going in and out after 1month not happy with the purchase the tv was gift to my mother for Christmas I'm very unsatisfied

Reviews.Title: Very nice television for the price
Reviews.Author: Steven Daniel Thornburg
Reviews.Content: I really shopped around for this television because I was on a budget but wanted to get a nice television for my mothers gift.  I didn't want a no name cheap tv, I wanted a good name brand but still under 400 bucks.  After setting up the tv to HD satellite, the picture was excellent and the overall quality of the tv is very nice.  I recommend this tv to anyone if it fits in your budget.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for a second TV
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: We put this in our bedroom to watch maybe 1-2 hours a day and its fine for that. You cant put a flash drive in it and watch movies from the flash drive which is probably the biggest downside. Other than that its not that bad.

Reviews.Title: Solid, good all rounder TV
Reviews.Author: Tech Wizard
Reviews.Content: This is a really solid all rounder performer.  Image is clear, refresh rate is high, menu and remote control is easy.  The only reason I stopped using it was I traded up.  I couldn't bear to see if sit and gather dust in a spare room so I gave it to a friend who would actually use it.

Reviews.Title: So Glad I Bought This TV!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: And thank you all for your reviews :-)It's exactly what everyone said it would be -- very easy set up -- crisp picture, good sound -- and all for just over $200!I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: A good value.
Reviews.Author: Brendan Berkley "Seek truth at ZAMagazine.org"
Reviews.Content: A nice screen in a compact box at a great price. Didn't TVs like this used to cost $1,000 or more?NO Smart TV features...the way I like it. I can make it smart with a computer/Apple TV/Roku; I'd rather my dollars go to the screen rather than the features.With one exception (mentioned later), everything is really accessible by the remote. It felt pretty intuitive.There are some little things that I appreciate. When I plug in HDMI, it offers to switch. When something isn't in a port, I don't have to cycle through it when I'm changing inputs. This is nice.When I have any nits to pick with it, I try to remind myself that it was such a reasonable price. But the biggest flaw is that it auto-dims based on the ambient lighting. I should be able to control that. Sometimes when all of the lights are out it ends up being a little dimmer than I'd like. Also, only two HDMI ports. Not a huge deal for my use case, but I wonder if HDMI ports are a real cost addition or if they kept it low to encourage you to buy elsewhere. Finally, it doesn't seem like you can do RCA audio inputs and outputs at the same time. That would be a really useful feature, but I don't know if that's common in other TVs or not.

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Adam Baer
Reviews.Content: I have used this as a bedroom TV. We like the size and picture quality. THe TV is very light and we were able to use or existing Wall Mount. I believe its a VESA100 mount. We have had the TV for several months and its turned on for at least an hour a day. Sometimes more. We really use it to watch cable programs. We don't watch Bluerays, etc. But i'm sure it would do well.

Reviews.Title: Quality and Great Price flatscreen. You can't beat it!
Reviews.Author: robbielyn
Reviews.Content: i love this flat screen! it's sleek sharp and looks nice in a small room. no bleed noticed at all. and for $35 get the chromecast and you got a smart tv with netflix huluplus hbogo and youtube. sound is excellent. color and sharpness amazing for $238.00!! it has 2 hdmi ports which is plenty for average user. the only thing i don't like, is the small stand it sits on. i have to put paperweights down to make sure it won't tip over if i were to bump into it. you can screw it down but i unable to as it sits on top of my dresser. i am not drilling a hole in it. but honestly that's my only con to this otherwise excellent and well-priced tv. LG is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Turning off by itself
Reviews.Author: Devin Batkiewicz
Reviews.Content: It keeps turning off by itself, then turning on when or if it feels like it. I have contacted LG for help. No help as of yet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Terrence A. Mizell
Reviews.Content: Unpacked easy, and assembling was a piece of cake.  Hooked up to my Direct-TV connection seamlessly and hooking  the other peripherals was a snap.Picture quality is excellent, even though its only 720 p.

Reviews.Title: LG 32" flat screen TV.
Reviews.Author: Peggy Strein
Reviews.Content: Great price and quality. It is the perfect TV for my bedroom. Great size and super sharp picture - a pleasure to own !

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl
Reviews.Content: Bought this LG TV for my sons 16th birthday and he loves it. I have no complaints, thus far. The sound is fine and the picture is great! Has plenty of 'fine tuning' capabilities and the price was reasonable!

Reviews.Title: LG, Thumbs Up
Reviews.Author: John Dang
Reviews.Content: I just received my TV this morning and as many other reviews said, it's very easy to set up and the picture quality is very good for the price. I was worried that the sound wasn't going to be good, given that I bought this TV on a budget, but the sound quality didn't disappoint. Overall, I'm very content with the TV, but I should've checked beforehand because I was looking for a television with a DVI port, or a VGA port at the very least. I don't know whether or not TVs have VGA/DVI ports at this price range, but I bought an adapter and it should suffice.

Reviews.Title: Nice HDTV
Reviews.Author: Rev. Mark Johnson "Rev Mark Johnson"
Reviews.Content: NIce HDTV  and picture clarity is not the best but good for guestroom so guest will not stay too long!

Reviews.Title: better viewing
Reviews.Author: schlo "schlo"
Reviews.Content: great  tv, had a Toshiba, just didn't do it.. much better view from different angles, unbelievably light, easy to handle

Reviews.Title: Great value!  lifes good!
Reviews.Author: Timothy D. Gougeon
Reviews.Content: Great tv. It is my second one. Great for bedroom. Quality picture and clear sound. I would recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: rejmom "rejmom"
Reviews.Content: this is a great price and a great tv with a tremendous picture/sound quality.  we are really happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Best Value For Money - Lacks USB Video Support/3.5mm Jack
Reviews.Author: Ravi
Reviews.Content: Using this since 5 months now, no complaints what so ever. Only 1 setback this has is that it doesn't have USB support for video so one can't watch movies using a pen drive or attaching hard drives and 3.5mm audio jack also doesn't work on this.Since I'm in India, I would like to inform buyers from India that it doesn't requires any voltage converter and it can easily hooked up with D2H HD from Videocon through HDMI. I purchased one of the NTSC to Pal Converter which wasn't clear and there were shades and lines in transmission while running local cable connection thus I switched to d2h and picture quality is amazing.Picture quality is amazing, sound is kinda OK, 2 HDMI inputs are sufficient and there's digital audio input too so no old speakers work that are on analog technology if you want sound output on bars but SPDIF (Coax) can be attached to this. Another good feature is energy-saving system this TV has which adjust contrast and brightness according to light in your room and thus saves your electricity by showing desired amount of picture your room ambiance should be having.To summarize in short, I love it and so does my family. Thanks for reading.

Reviews.Title: HAPPY
Reviews.Author: **Padrones**
Reviews.Content: Really happy and everything working fine. Brand new and no damage. easy set up and very user friendly. Glad i got this LG.

Reviews.Title: This tv needs a cape for it's awesomeness
Reviews.Author: Michael V.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this great t.v. on a Sunday night about 11pm.  I selected free I think 5 to 8 day shipping and I ended up receiving it at 11am on that Tuesday only 1 1/2 days after ordering it.  The t.v. itself was a great deal as the standard price was roughly $419.99 plus taxes and shipping costs.  I paid a total of $254.95 for the t.v., 7% PA sales tax, and shipping. I really am impressed that this LG HD LED 32" has so many details with it and with my Direct t.v. account I am far above and beyond satisfied.

Reviews.Title: A Suitable TV - "It Just Works."
Reviews.Author: Bryant "BZP"
Reviews.Content: Good little TV. No complaints, other than it only has two HDMI ports. But for the price and the high quality of the TV itself, no worries. Great buy for a dorm room or children's bedroom.

Reviews.Title: LG delivers on this TV for great price point
Reviews.Author: COWBOY JIUJITSU
Reviews.Content: Was a bit skeptical of LG TV as we had a former LG plasma that had blue vertical lines pop up after about 3yrs. Based off the positive Amazon reviews, I decided to give them one more try for this as TV for spare room / office.Glad I did - picture quality is GREAT and super clean. No issues with setup  - VERY lightweight so made mounting on wall very easy.I'm glad a I took another chance on LG - so far so good and at this price point, cant go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for our tailgate!
Reviews.Author: in SC
Reviews.Content: We got this tv to use with a small satellite system for tailgating at football games and it has worked great!  The picture is very clear and the controls are super easy to set.  We actually considered a bigger screen, but the 32" is perfect for what we use it for.

Reviews.Title: A Good Value Flat Panel TV
Reviews.Author: Ed Williams
Reviews.Content: This TV is nicely styled and featured for a value-priced flat panel. I do not have this one hooked to a hi-def source, nor is it used with a DVD player, so I can't fully comment on the true quality potential of the image. But using it through a cable TV converter (a guest bedroom tv setup), it is very viewable and functional.

Reviews.Title: Easy install & works great
Reviews.Author: Luna's mom
Reviews.Content: Great price & great product! Highly recommend. We have wall mounted & works like a charm. Please note that I think it comes preset for energy-saving & that was making our screen dim each night, so we adjusted and no more dimming. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a good price
Reviews.Author: JNunley
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tv for the price. I bought it to go in my office so the size was perfect. It has a great picture and the design is nice.

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: Nina Bohuslawsky
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my other half who is a TV fanatic. The picture is great and the sound is great. It is a bedroom TV, so we do not need anything fancy.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V.
Reviews.Author: shanna dickerson
Reviews.Content: I was and am very happy with this t.v. I saw that many people had to mess with the settings...I must be super lucky but i havent messed with one setting besides changing the view option to 'cinema' other than that this is great on action movies...animated...its on my bedroom and perfect size. I think the sound quality is great.i really love LG i have a 47" in my living room and that's why i went with this one and once again they came out on top and i am glad/happy with my choice.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!
Reviews.Author: kitty "kittyjoy22"
Reviews.Content: It was easy to set up (I'm not good at electronics). I was amazed that I had no problems. It has a beautiful picture. It is HD compatible but I don't subscribe to HD service. It has great sound. I was concerned at first about some channels having a black border but a simple adjustment in the menu took care of that. This is my second LG and I love them both.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Auwilda M. Polk
Reviews.Content: Bought as gift for my mother.  It was just as expected;  picture clear; viewing angle is great; just right size for area for which purchased.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Richard Smith "ramsfan"
Reviews.Content: very happy with this TV. LG makes a great TV. would buy another one without a question. and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Second TV
Reviews.Author: Satisfied in Seattle "Satisfied"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  Easy to set up and use, great picture and sound.  Perfect size for a bedroom or other occasional use TV.

Reviews.Title: beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Judith A. Curry
Reviews.Content: good sound - takes awhile to learn how to use it, and can't turn off the light but happy with it.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics LN530B 32 Inch LED TV
Reviews.Author: A. A. Jones
Reviews.Content: I Initially experienced problems in setting up the TV, and received excellent telephonic supportfrom their technicians to complete the setup.  The problems involved adapting the TV to my cable service and not to any defect.Assembly involved attaching the stand to the TV.  The instructions were adequate and the task is easy to complete.  It has been in service for several months now with no problems experienced. This TV has excellent picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Poor instructions.
Reviews.Author: David F
Reviews.Content: Where to start?  The instructions are fine for putting the base on.  With regards to connections, they are useless.  I have a cable box and a DVD player.  The instructions to connect these items are 100% inadequate.  I would not have purchased this item if I had known this.  As for the TV,  my last TV was a CRT screen, need I say more?I forgot to add that their web site is unresponsive.  I tried to register my product and it wouldn't accept it.  I tried to sign up so I could then register it, it wouldn't accept me.Update:  Looked on web to see how to properly connect everything.  Determined I needed a RF Modulator.  Bought a GE, RF Modulator, Connects All Kit, followed the instructions and diagrams and it works like a charm!

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Robert Byrd
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mom.  She misses the "guide" her old TV had (she doesn't have cable and gets her digital TV over the air) but other than that has no complaints.  Complicated remote controls and menus put her in a tizzy but she has no trouble using this.  For the price it's a great television.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Cathy Kehl
Reviews.Content: I would recommend to anyone that needs a smaller TV.  It is our second LG so we are familiar with the brand.  It is great for a bedroom.  Works well and has good picture.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Alamo "Alamo"
Reviews.Content: After about 20 years with two "500 lb" 20+" Panasonics (both still work by the way), it was time for change. As usual, did all my research on various products here on Amazon. Took a longshot based on price, etc. and tried Vizio two weeks ago. That lasted about 24 hours, returned set to Walmart and back to drawing board.This week, we purchased this 32" LG product also from Walmart for about $5 more than we could get at Amazon. Three cheers for Amazon tough competition! With record speed and accuracy, this unit was operating perfectly and the whole buying experience was 100% pleasure. The comparable Vizio experience was about 30% at best. The LG paper Manual is hands-down better than Vizio's useless "guide" and on top of that, LG provides you with a CD with the Manual duplicated plus added information that takes your knowledge much further (definitely necessary for me). Set-up was excellent and all LG ad claims hold true so far. For our second Panasonic replacement, we're researching 40-50" models. LG will get that additional business based on satisfaction here (hope to also make it an Amazon transaction).

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Richard Thompson
Reviews.Content: The picture is very good.  It is clear and bright.  Would have given a higher rating if it had an rca sound out.  It does have optical sound out for newer systems.

Reviews.Title: Unable to find HDMI cable
Reviews.Author: rajasekhar
Reviews.Content: Hi , I got the TV yesterday , but i did not find HDMI cable ? Do we need to purchase it seperately ?

Reviews.Title: really a great tv
Reviews.Author: mr. chris davitt
Reviews.Content: this tv fit all i wanted in a tv. much thinner then my old 32 inch with more picture and less frame. it also had all the connections for digital audio and analog sound. the only problem i had is there are never any good views of the back of the tvs so you can see what connections are on the back. overall i am happy with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Can't Beat for the Price
Reviews.Author: Brad Cutler
Reviews.Content: Thin design and vivid picture. Currently using in a dorm room and it is the perfect size. I looked at 32" tvs all day, debating whether to get a cheapo or quality LED. For $40 extra over a no-name Kmart special, this is superior on all fronts.

Reviews.Title: A good buy
Reviews.Author: Great Scott
Reviews.Content: I have seen better quality pictures in some more expensive TVs, but not at the price ($241) this was. And nowadays all LCDs are great pictures.The picture settings were easy to adjust using the guide they provide with the programming menu.The base does not swivel, so be sure that won't be an issue for where the TV will be used. It is only 24 pounds though, so infrequent adjustments are easy.My local electronics stores sell HDMI cables for about $35 and up.  Amazon sells them for about $6.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Gorgor
Reviews.Content: I wanted a decent sized (bigger than the one I had) LCD TV for my home office while I worked at my desk so I waited for this unit to go on sale. I am very happy with my purchaseGreat picture from most viewing angles.Better than expected sound quality.Very easy setup.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Watfamily "Watfamily"
Reviews.Content: Just what was expected and packaged nicely.  Great picture-my son uses it for video games and he loves the clarity and detail.

Reviews.Title: Unstable
Reviews.Author: Christy Park
Reviews.Content: I returned this TV because the screen wobbled on the stand.  it was very unstable and I could not find a way to make it more secure.

Reviews.Title: Mothers Day gift
Reviews.Author: david w williams
Reviews.Content: Received enthusiastically. Even my brother, who is mechanically, inept, had no problem setting up. I would buy for myself, but do not need another TV.

Reviews.Title: perfect TV for us.
Reviews.Author: Lee C Frazier
Reviews.Content: Yes it did, LG is my favorite TV interms of quality and efficient. Bought this tv for my daughter.  She loves it!

Reviews.Title: A very good tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Kim Canavas
Reviews.Content: This TV was a gift for my husband. We were pleased with the cost and the quality of the TV. Very good picture. The channel programing was a little confusing but we will figure it out with the book. The TV auto tuned the channels but added additional ones we did not want, besides our cable line up of channels.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LN530B 32in 720P LED TV
Reviews.Author: Empiror22
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my parents,  It is a great TV for the money but the lack of 1080P is a bummer.  My parents don't care as they watch only over the air TV programs.  I think for the money it is great.  has enough hook ups for the average home especially if used as a secondary TV.

Reviews.Title: It's everything I hoped for.
Reviews.Author: Bruce Alger
Reviews.Content: I chose it for the price, but I'm very happy with the picture quality. I bought it for the bedroom and it makes late night TV much more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Diane Kalousek
Reviews.Content: I have another LG TV and I am pleased with both the 42 inch and now the 32 inch for my bedroom.  I had an old Sony 27 inch TV that finally broke.  I just love this new LG TV.  The picture is beautiful and it was so easy to set up.  And the price was right.  Initially when I received the TV I did not realize that the box had a big hole and the TV was damaged.  I contacted Amazon, had UPS pick up the TV and Amazon sent a replacement.  No questions asked.  It was incredibly easy.  I just love doing business with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Delta "Delta"
Reviews.Content: We had to replace a 12 year-old TV. What a difference this one makes! I had looked up COnsumer Reports before purchasing and found LG to be among the best--which it is!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Matthew Brown
Reviews.Content: Does the job. Great picture. Rasy to mount. Good inexpensive tv for kids room. Would buy again if I need a good budget tv.

Reviews.Title: Not enough inputs
Reviews.Author: BD King
Reviews.Content: This TV is cheap, but the picture quality is very good.  I gave it a low rating due to a single HDMI input on the back. There are supposed to be two, but I can only see one.  If that is not important to you, then I would bump it up two stars to a 4.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: MDavis
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is superb.  I love this TV!  For the price, the quality of the TV well exceeded my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture, Even Better Price
Reviews.Author: R. Phillips
Reviews.Content: What a great looking television!  The screen is beautiful.  I searched for so many televisions in this price range and this was the best I could find.  I'm so happy with this choice and recommend it for anyone trying to make a decision.  It's so lightweight and slim but the picture quality is fantastic.  I just can't believe I got a television of this quality for this price.  No regrets!

Reviews.Title: LG 32" 720 dpi just as advertised
Reviews.Author: Steve K Rumsey
Reviews.Content: 5 stars, because the APEX we had for 6 months had rotting plasma syndrome which basically ruined the TV.  I had purchased on black Friday and it died.  Target wouldn't take it back and left me with the manufacturer, who doesn't seem to care.Anyway, have heard great things about LG for years so wanted this, a Samsung or Toshiba.  It's been around 2 months and the picture is great.  Sounds 10xs better than the APEX too.  We run cable thru it as well as double duty as a PC monitor.  Good stuff.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff S. Boone "Hello! Hello!  HOLA!"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture. Had a few scratches on frame and stand but nothing I could not live with. Love this tv.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: B. Davis "The Happy Hermit"
Reviews.Content: I use this in my small bedroom on a low table with a DVD player and a Roku 3. I am perfectly happy with the TV and am not having any instability issues at all. In fact I set it on a fabric placemat to allow for easier repositioning than the rubber feet allow.I slide it around daily and it has never tipped over.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: paula hondzinski
Reviews.Content: Needed a tv for the bedroom this one fist the bill ...great picture very satisfied with my purchase would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Martin Mousseau
Reviews.Content: That is a good product. LG did well on that TV except one thing. USB port does not support vidéos like movies. I had to buy something else that can convert the movies format to my TV.

Reviews.Title: Picture is great, sound is terrible
Reviews.Author: Martha Bick
Reviews.Content: The picture is great on the LG 32inch but the sound is bad. I have great hearing and I have to turn the volume up in the 80's to hear it and then it has a horrible static.  I will have to purchase an additional speaker system for this TV. I do not recommend to anyone to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Color is Weird
Reviews.Author: Mary L.
Reviews.Content: I chose this TV because I have other LG products that I am very happy with.  This TV looks nice, was easy to set up and is very light weight but the color is extremely weird.  No matter what picture format I choose, it looks extremely washed out, in many cases so bright that you can barely differentiate between a person's face and a light colored background.  To make it worse, when there are very bright/dark colors on the screen, such as bright blues and greens, those colors are so bright they distort everything else.  I have tried adjusting the brightness, color, tint, etc. settings with no luck, the picture still looks extremely weird.  Glad we bought it for a bedroom and it isn't the main TV in the house.  I would not recommend this TV due to the color problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Michael Williamson
Reviews.Content: Couldn't ask for a better television..... sets up quickly and works as a television or monitor.  Would recommend this to anyone interested in a 32" TV

Reviews.Title: This is my first flatscreen but I've experience with several different models
Reviews.Author: ed1300 "ed1300"
Reviews.Content: The setup was easy and within 20 mins I was up and running. The additional time was because I had to configure Chromecast. I'm loving the ability to stream to the tv from my Google 2013 7' tablet. The sound is great for the bedroom and though the included booklet is useless because it does not describe any of the tv's functions. The menu's allowed me to tweak the sound defaults like cinema, music, sports etc. There are also manual options. Same for the picture.I connected my laptop chromecast and sent over a flash video feed from chrome browser showing a movie from Amazon Prime. However it was slow and choppy. This could be a problem with my laptop. Not sure. Today I will connect it to my gaming rig which has  Intel i5 Processor and ATI Radeon 7770 1gb video card to see how it plays for both video and gaming. I suspect it will act as a second monitor which should be no problem.

Reviews.Title: Good for a bedroom
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughters.  The size screen is large enough for the bedroom and the clarity is very good.  The girls love it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: ali mae
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen TV and I am very satisfied. It works great, has a great picture, is attractive and neatly fits on the wall. I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: mdevil
Reviews.Content: Top of the line at a very good price! Size of the TV is just right for a bedroom and hangs well on the wall!

Reviews.Title: Yep, just what I expected
Reviews.Author: Mike the Elder "Aonbarr"
Reviews.Content: I already own an LG 42" and I wanted (needed?) a 32" TV. I looked around at many other brands but I eventually realized that I already know how much I liked my current LG. Sold! I bought this one and am entirely pleased with it. I will always recommend this brand and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Cost - Using as Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: Bryan Williams
Reviews.Content: Would be great if 1080p, but your cant argue with the price. The quality of the image is good even when converting DVI up to HDMI.

Reviews.Title: Average
Reviews.Author: Sacred Courage
Reviews.Content: Not the best television in the world, but the LG 32 inch will hold me over until I can find a flat screen with a headphone output.

Reviews.Title: lg tv
Reviews.Author: Denise Carter
Reviews.Content: Works great.  The hand contol is easy to use.  Would suggest it to a friend. I would probably buy another

Reviews.Title: excellent tv for the price
Reviews.Author: richard mojica
Reviews.Content: as the other reviewers on here said, it's a great tv for the price. I bought an amazon fire tv to go with it

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Drakula "Born2Die"
Reviews.Content: Arrive today,working just fine that's what they told me, I didn't see it yet .. so I guess it should survive ;)

Reviews.Title: It's so good!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Ruiz
Reviews.Content: I was really suspicious of the price, but wow! I love it!! I has different frequencies for each channel and great resolution. Easy set up and looks really cool. Have your screwdriver handy when you open the package and you'll be set in just a few!

Reviews.Title: quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The quality of the images and the the great sounding audio makes this a great buy!!!  I would gladly purchase LG products again.

Reviews.Title: Happy LG Customer
Reviews.Author: Savanah Mestas
Reviews.Content: I'm using my TV as I speak and it works great! Arrived when I expected it to. it looks and works brand new. Doesn't even look refurbished. I was definitely satisfied with my purchase and I would recommend to anyone who needs a decent size TV.

Reviews.Title: LG t.v.s
Reviews.Author: Jose Rubio "joerand1"
Reviews.Content: Love LG tv, have 2 of the the same model.  Good picture, easy to operate all menu items., good sound.

Reviews.Title: Great price for TV
Reviews.Author: Mikebernet
Reviews.Content: If you only need 1 HDMI and and don't care if it is only 720p, then this is for you, Bought one off of newegg, then  a second one from Amazon.  Picture is good. No problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Would Buy Again
Reviews.Author: merla jo lewis
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, sound, quality, would recommend highly.I had this wall mounted and I love it.  The best tv ever!

Reviews.Title: Good price, average picture
Reviews.Author: Joseph Flippen
Reviews.Content: Good quality TV a this price level, picture is bright but average.  The TV is very light just 10 pounds, perfect for mounting outside on the patio.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Tolbin Boskat
Reviews.Content: This was, and is, my first flat screen TV and I highly recommend others to buy it too. It's reliable, easy to use, feather light, and quite affordable.

Reviews.Title: as good advertised
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: works great, easy set up.  My son used it for gaming and loves it too.  Has a very nice picture

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality
Reviews.Author: Saundra M. Wilson
Reviews.Content: It is everything I was looking for ...bright, clear picture, sound! It's thin presentation does not overwhelm my small apartment!

Reviews.Title: great bargain
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: This is a awesome TV crisp and clear and very thin I got it at first for advertising I was going to hang it in my shop but I love it so much that I took it home and got another one

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: Hyunchang M.
Reviews.Content: Good quality i am very satisfied it is thebest of 32inch lcd led tv monitir i supposed up to now

Reviews.Title: Great value in TV
Reviews.Author: Barry Jacobs
Reviews.Content: The only problem associated with this product was that Amazon sent it to an old address but they made that right as soon as possible. The TV works well, has good adjustments and great sound. It isn't 50 inches but it really is a great 32 inch screen.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: D. Gentry "hip60s"
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice TV. The price is very reasonable, but you could pay a lot more and not get near the quality of this TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: sandy's amazon
Reviews.Content: got on flash deal. very happy. great picture. only complaint is the remote, you have to push the buttons really hard to get them to function.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Gordon Gerick
Reviews.Content: We've been looking for a TV for the spare bedroom, and this one worked just fine for the size of the room. The color and contrast were excellent. Our guest can rest in bed and look at TV, and still be comfortable.Gordon GerickAuthor, Adoption-Lost and Found

Reviews.Title: excellent very good
Reviews.Author: leandrocolms
Reviews.Content: This LG tv is great I really love it and is very comfortable and functional thanks really very happy and very safe and very sharp image ....

Reviews.Title: Great performance
Reviews.Author: Chad Hix
