Reviews.Content: This tv was actually more than I thought it would be. I bought it as an extra for a back bedroom of the house. We have an Xbox 360 and an Xbox One hooked up to it. The tv does a great job with the sound and the picture

Reviews.Title: Faulty TV, hoping the next one is better.
Reviews.Author: Tyler Dekker
Reviews.Content: Works okay for awhile but then drops connection and tv randomly turns off. Will try for another..hopefully and a redo will come later.

Reviews.Title: Not most expensive and not cheap
Reviews.Author: Danny Edwards
Reviews.Content: Good price for bedroom TV.  Works great and has a very good picture off the antenna in the attic.Sound is fine also!!!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: ¼ÛÇÏÃ¶
Reviews.Content: But the code was surprising me.it need additional consent for using in Korea.Except that it's very good TV.

Reviews.Title: Incredible value for the price
Reviews.Author: v10
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a surveillance system monitor but it's so good I moved it into my home office for TV viewing.  I just have the coax cable plugged in the back but it picks up most of the stations on the cable box on those extended channels like 125-1 which I just added to the favorites menu.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: mg
Reviews.Content: Solid little tv. Biggest down side is the single hdmi plug that sticks straight out the back of the tv so if you are hanging it on a wall it can be a pain. But the build quality of the tv is great with nice fit and finish, much better than my 55 inch vizio. The picture also  looks very nice even with the stock calibration. We got it for 150 on black friday, so for that price its perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great kids TV
Reviews.Author: Alisha Davis
Reviews.Content: Decent tv for the price,  it could use some more inputs,  but easy to put together and really  fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Randy C.
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV for the price!Very bright. Good color.A small rim allows it to fit where other 32" TVs cannot fit.

Reviews.Title: TV Already broken
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I bought this in October and it's only February. The TV is already malfunctions it shuts off by itself and will not let me turn it back on. No problem with the seller if they will at least let me exchange this tv for another.

Reviews.Title: Good picture at a low price
Reviews.Author: Bob Harley
Reviews.Content: I have this TV in my bedroom and it provides a high quality picture for watching TV shows and movies.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Sizana Ezana
Reviews.Content: only 230 for this great tv, everything looks fantastic on it and was easy to set up! Large screen for such a low price!

Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: s267435
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price, nice picture quality, light weight. It has met all of my initial expectations thus far

Reviews.Title: ups deliverd it mon, im so happy it was brand new, always but them new.
Reviews.Author: Jeff Patterson
Reviews.Content: I would never buy one more than $500.00 I don't see the point, and I love big tvs, this is very clean, and clear, and now you only have to pay about $200.00 before shipping of course, I don't think Ill need another tv until at least 20 years later, great!1!!

Reviews.Title: AMAZON I think I LOVE YOU!
Reviews.Author: RubAnADUB "Customize it, as stock is never al...
Reviews.Content: Dear Amazon, I bought this tv as you put it on sale for black friday weekend for 150$. And it was just the Christmas gift to myself and my wife we needed. Thank you for the great deal and the SUPER FAST SHIPPING OMG it came on a sunday!@!!

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Joseph N. Vitale
Reviews.Content: i am not a tech guy so i cant say much about this.  we like it and it does a great job for us.

Reviews.Title: Lg 32" LED TV
Reviews.Author: missyqueen "TM"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for my son for Christmas. It was a closeout for $150.00. Very Happy with purchase. He plays mostly video games on the TV and the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: SadGirl "Sadgirl"
Reviews.Content: was not so sure about buying a tv but to my surprise it was boxed well and delivered without a scratch on it. Seems to be working fine too

Reviews.Title: Good priced LED TV
Reviews.Author: Polymer Engineer
Reviews.Content: This LED TV was good for the price and lightweight.  Ideal for hanging on a wall or in a kids bedroom.

Reviews.Title: LG TV's are the best
Reviews.Author: CONNIE ADKINS
Reviews.Content: I love my tv. The picture is clear. I got. one of these for my son for x-mas a few years ago and he loves it also.

Reviews.Title: Great!! ,every thing a got, tanks Amazon.
Reviews.Author: Miguel Jorge
Reviews.Content: it is the perfect size for my room, also the picture is perfect, manualy fit my expectations to move around the room ,Love it!!.

Reviews.Title: Great picture clarity, Great customer support
Reviews.Author: GardenGoddess
Reviews.Content: Minimal assembly for the base is required, but I didn't read directions clearly and thought I was missing the required screws. I called LG customer service and was bowled over by their quick, professional response. The customer service rep explained the mix-up without making me feel like the idiot I was, and assured me that LG customer service is available 24/7. I bought this TV for the price but would choose to buy LG in the future because they actually provide customer service.  Picture is sharp and clear out of the box. The menu offers all sorts of adjustments, but I haven't found any tweaking necessary. Auto scan easily identified all channels I receive, plus a couple I didn't know were on my cable service. Sound is crisp and I haven't noticed the amped up sound on commercials that I notice on my Sony TV. I would purchase this TV again without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: picture quality is very good for a model without 1080i..
Reviews.Author: John Fortuna
Reviews.Content: easy to use..remote is very practical..and for the price you could not go wrong..great TV for small rooms..easy to understand installation

Reviews.Title: I got a bad one.
Reviews.Author: Zig Meyer
Reviews.Content: I'm sure it was nobody's fault.  I bought a refurbished one.  It didn't work.  The company was very nice and refunded me immediately.  Too sad, though.  I ended up getting a Smart TV at WalMart for the same price.  Usually I have very good purchases on Amazon.  I should have bought new in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Tanya D. Copeland
Reviews.Content: Love the quality of the picture and it was delivered right on time.  Hooked it up to gaming console, Direct TV and sound system with no problem.

Reviews.Title: I like
Reviews.Author: bcl22
Reviews.Content: So far so good, great resolution. This is a great tv for the price, no complaints. I recommend for any one.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Michael Orellana
Reviews.Content: Was sent in perft conditions,just like was described.  works very well and was packed carefully.  photos were real and truly.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the bedroom!
Reviews.Author: little
Reviews.Content: The sound and picture on this TV are awesome! My only complaint is that it doesn't swivel. But it is very user friendly, set up was a breeze. It is a great space saver compared to the huge 25 inch TV we had.

Reviews.Title: Quality and price super; a few minor problems
Reviews.Author: RECMD "BobC"
Reviews.Content: Wanted low end of price without sacrificing quality. Stores to look at are an hour away. Son had chosen large LG over Samsung on narrow margin, so I did. Using a MagnaV HDD for input source because I want the instant record/pause; I have done quite a bit of pic adjustments. Presets are deficient, and different quality depending on source-- ant direct, AV or HDMI, from recorder, or Roku.  Contrast, sharpness, bright, color all needed tweaking.Disappointed that only audio output is via DigitalOptical. I hoped to connect Bose sound to TV output. Bought an Optic to AV converter plug. Can only get a flutter type noise, like a card in bike spokes. Tried new AV plugs etc etc. No luck. I now connect Bose via the MagnaV HDD and it works fine, but excludes Roku to TV.LG "Simplex" set up does not work with the MagV to allow single remote.MagV does have a 'Fun-Link" [via HDMI only], which allows MAG remote to  control on/off of TV, but still needs two remotes for volume.All in all, I am very satisfied with the LG.

Reviews.Title: Lg 32 inch led TV
Reviews.Author: edda clark
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the TV and the fact that it was very affordable was icing on the cake

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Vern
Reviews.Content: This television is a bargain.  I bought this for my bedroom and you couldm't ask for anything more. Picture is very good, sound is great.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Harris
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased a different, lesser known brand with all the bells and whistles but was immediately dissapointed with the quality of the set and returned it. The picture on this set is excellent and the sound is not bad either. Has everything I need and nothing more. I recommend it. Originally wanted a 1080i because...well because...but then my better sense got to me. There are virtually no channels on my cable service that are even offered in 1080i, and with the size just being a 32 inch, the picture in 720i is really quite excellent. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: T. HALASNIK
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my dad's bedroom to replace an old tube tv. I mounted it to the wall which freed up a ton of room. Picture & sound are awesome. Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Blinker
Reviews.Content: I bought this during the thanksgiving sale time.  I paid $170 for it.  It was a present for my dad.  The overall quality is nice.  The sound is nothing to brag about, but that's expected.  The picture quality looks nice and clear.  I hated screwing the base to the tv as I couldn't find a long screwdriver that was small enough to work.  I eventually found a way to make it work.

Reviews.Title: My LG TV……..
Reviews.Author: Veronica Williams
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful….I hope it will last longer than my last TV…only 5 years for a DYNEX???I had my first experience with LG products, when I purchased an AC.  I was very pleased with it…was also pleased with the follow-up to check on AC, much like you are doing now.In this day and age, your customer service department….is going to make all the difference in your sales department.Congrats on your customer oriented attitude and your great products!Veronica Williams

Reviews.Title: Great picture, perfect for the bedroom.
Reviews.Author: Michael O. Sanchez "Mike2005"
Reviews.Content: This is my second LG TV. I've owned several brands and I have to say LG is the to go if you are on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Jason Hills
Reviews.Content: Needed a good tv to fit a budget. Everything about this TV is great. Beautiful picture and great sound. I would spend the extra ~25 bucks over the cheap brand TVs any day.

Reviews.Title: It fits!
Reviews.Author: william madill
Reviews.Content: We're delighted with it. It is mounted in the motorhome and fits where the old 90 lb TV came out. With some study it fits without so much as a fraction of an inch to spare. Now I have to hope it stands up to the rigors of highway travel in a big motorhome.Oops! Looks like we submitted our review too soon. The TV is only 3 months old and is turning off and on by itself and it's looking like service is scarce in central Florida. Waiting for a repair facility 50 miles away to call back 5 days after calling them.

Reviews.Title: Very very nice
Reviews.Author: Brizeida
Reviews.Content: I love. This TV is very good. The excellent image resolution. The Product is accurately described by the seller. Very good price-quality ratio. Ensures the satisfaction of children and adults. I recommend it 100%

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: Chris Van Dyk
Reviews.Content: The product met all expectations. It even installed the cable itself. That was convenient, to say the least. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: JesseJ
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our bedroom, connecting to our cable and AppleTV.  We didn't need all the bells and whistles, so for the money this is great value.  After some minor changes to the picture setting (Taking out of "ECO-Mode") leaves you with a more vibrant and clear picture.If I needed another 32" TV, I'd buy one of these again.  Recommended.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: ChozyCorleon
Reviews.Content: this is a good tv love it and it works as its should. very affordable its worth the money spent

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael Grizzard
Reviews.Content: I needed an extra t.v. for the bedroom and even without the HD connected to this t.v., the picture is still good. For most people, the difference between 720p and 1080p isn't that noticeable. If you're looking for a secondary t.v., this one will work. Easy to set up out of the box, the picture required minimal adjusting, and the stand is easy to put together and onto the t.v.I enjoy the small border around the screen, which makes it look bigger. The power cord for the t.v. isn't very long, but it's adequate. I've become a Vizio guy over the years, but am impressed with this LG and do not have a problem recommending it to anyone who wants a budget friendly option.

Reviews.Title: Awesome T.V.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for My Bedroom and have enjoyed the clear sound and picture.  If you are looking for a deeper bass with the sound would recommend a sound bar with the T.V.

Reviews.Title: What a fantastic value!
Reviews.Author: Lee N. Rosenberg-Adams
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for our children for Christmas.  We put it in the den and the picture quality is amazing.  I love it and the price was great.  Was delivered as promised and we are extremely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: J-W
Reviews.Content: This product was more then I expected. I bought it cheap and I thought it was gonna be kind of sucky but quite the contrary it is EXCELLENT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Picture is great. Perfect for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Lane W. Greer
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our bedroom. We don't have cable in our bedroom and just bought a Chromecast to use with it. It really is perfect. The only two things that would be better is if the sound was a bit stronger and I really wish the TV stand allowed to tilt forward and back as we have it on top of a tall dresser and would like to be able to tilt it down to provide a more direct viewing angle.Strictly speaking about the the picture quality, this is an LG product and the picture is nothing short of what I've come to expect from LG. The picture is gorgeous! I highly recommend this TV as a secondary device for a bedroom or a kitchen.

Reviews.Title: I love my TV
Reviews.Author: KATHIE
Reviews.Content: The picture is beautiful and was very easy to set up to my own likings  Now as soon as I can get onto my gmail account everything will be golden.  I just got set up with the Direct TV genie and am looking forward to playing on the internet.Thank you LG I now have two of your TV's.  We all just love it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: William D. Niebuhr
Reviews.Content: We have another LG TV as our main TV and were looking for a smaller one for the bedroom.  Having had very good experience with the first one, when we saw this one, at a very good price, we got it.Very happy with it so far.  Arrived on time and well packed to prevent possible damage.  Was very easy to set up.  It is 720P but the picture is great.  Will usually watch movies and sporting events on our other TV (it is 1080p, 120 Hz and connected to a sound system), but so far we notice little difference in picture and sound quality from this TV.  Would highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for a smaller TV at a good price for something like a bedroom.  I would definitely rate this a terrific value

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Diane Bailey
Reviews.Content: Gave this TV as a Christmas gift.  My sister seems to love it.  It was easy for her to set up and has a great picture.  Happy, Happy, Happy

Reviews.Title: LG TV32LN520B 32-inch 720p 60hz led
Reviews.Author: oi m tse
Reviews.Content: All good. light weight. Size good for bed room. Great display and color is bright, sound is perfect. Good price.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: The tv is great but only has the option for 1 av connection its the only downfall to the tv

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Gayle McAlister
Reviews.Content: Have LG big screen so I knew I would love this one too.  Perfect size for bedroom.  Highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: P. Metzger "Alwayzwrong"
Reviews.Content: Why I would have given the item 5 stars:The price was great (albeit I got it on Black Friday).The picture has great colors, contrast, and is altogether beautiful.It has a nice thin form factor and the bexel is pretty thin.Why I ended up giving it 4 stars:One HDMI input.  This almost makes me want to cry.  One more HDMI input and I would have been thrilled.Eco settings.  Yeah, it'll save power, but not your eyesight.  You are almost required to remove eco power right out of the gate.  Otherwise the screen is just too dim.  I kept changing the blacklight and brightness settings when I first bought the TV to make the screen brighter, but didn't realize the eco settings were on by default.  I would have loved a prompt telling me that I would probably like the ecco setting off when I was adjusting the brightness and blacklight levels so high.Nevertheless, this is a great television.  Lightweight, with a thin form factor and great picture.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: RazorbladeKiss42
Reviews.Content: I've had it for about a month now, and it serves its purpose well. Picture is nice, sound is good. Lightweight, attractive design. Don't buy an off-brand HDTV, get this one instead.

Reviews.Title: LG 32"TV
Reviews.Author: Jack Montgomery
Reviews.Content: This model  LG TV is exactly what I wanted. The Size is right and it is  Easy to self install and priced right.  Jack M

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Celine M. Coon
Reviews.Content: Love electronics that you plug in and they work. Great value, now my Roku works.  Thanks for the great value

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: L. fuller
Reviews.Content: I gave as a Christmas gift. Color clarity and sound are excellent.  TV arrived in perfect condition.Thank you very much!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: I am a fan of LG tvs.  This tv does not disappoint.  Terrific picture.  This is the perfect size tv for a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Good picture. Good value.
Reviews.Author: D E Johnson
Reviews.Content: The picture is clear and color is of good quality. A good value with its reasonable pricing. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Flat screen TV - OK once you get it set up
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: The installation instructions are terrible. You will need someone experienced to set it up or perhaps some kind person has posted instructions on line. Even the equipment set up instructions were inadequate.

Reviews.Title: Great TVs.
Reviews.Author: P. Masullo
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these.  Set one up in my son's room and it was a breeze.  The stand is very sturdy (its on a dresser as opposed to wall mount).  The picture is great and the channel tuning only took a few minutes.  I was very impressed by the flexibility in the menu options; you normally find that number of options on higher price point TVs.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Chris Farmer
Reviews.Content: The set up information was very easy to understand and complete.  The TV was light weight and very stable on the stand.  The picture is very clear and sharp.Shipping was a day earlier than forecasted-a great surprise!

Reviews.Title: LG  --  32 IN  32LN520B  -  TV  - EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: EDWIN FOOTE
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV right out of the box with a great picture  -  good sound quality and easy to use remoteEveryone who sees it exclaims to the picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a good price point
Reviews.Author: Daniel Grosso
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my elderly mother as a gift. I own two LG televisions both 37 inch and have been very satisfied with them. My mother has a small apartment and it fit perfectly in her space. Not too big an not too small. She has commented several times on how much she likes it. It was very easy to set up. I simply attached the base following the instructions turned it on, ran the auto channel select and I was done.

Reviews.Title: Great color and function for price.
Reviews.Author: Tracy Golden
Reviews.Content: Fantastic colors and easy assembly, great price. I have other LG's and bought it as a gift. This is a gift that won't be returned

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ken Snow
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price. Picture quality is pretty good. Sound is also pretty good, I would for sur purchase another LG

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with LG
Reviews.Author: Lewis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mom to replace an older TV.  It has been far simpler for her to learn and use and she has been most pleased with it.  We even purchased a smaller version in the same line for her bedroom.  And the price at Amazon made it the perfect gift!

Reviews.Title: Blown away!
Reviews.Author: Ed Nigma
Reviews.Content: Having seen L G products in stores and a friends home I decided that was the brand I wanted. I was not prepared for the beautiful picture quality. The ease of set up and the sleek design of the unit makes me want to give this product two thumbs up. Life is good.

Reviews.Title: Good Price
Reviews.Author: Sandra harrison
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect for the bedroom.  The picture and sound are clear.  It arrived quickly and was easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 "
Reviews.Author: Jean Allen
Reviews.Content: Price was good as we needed two....on/off light is not very visible...manual control on set very hard to access..reg control ok but has issues with  screen view..( sleep timer) etc

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Ferris
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture and perfect size for the bedroom. Just love the quality of the picture and the price was great!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a very decent 32" led tv and happily meet my expectations for the price, if you want a superior one, more money is necessary

Reviews.Title: Sweet Sauce!
Reviews.Author: milagro jassmine carpio
Reviews.Content: Very econimical, at least for the special I bought it for during Black Friday. User Friendly. Bought a Bluray with Wifi, so how its like a smart tv. Sweet Sauce!

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Westerfield
Reviews.Content: Ordered on a monday and it arrived 2 days later.  Tv was exactly as advertised and extremely light.  Picture quality is excellent for a childs tv.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Karina Romney
Reviews.Content: Mom loved it but I thought it was a smart tv unfortunately bought it by mistake. But it'll do in the meantime though!

Reviews.Title: Clear and its LG
Reviews.Author: Eugene
Reviews.Content: love how clear it is and bright the only thing is the automatic eco mode which dim the tv a little too much and the controls are a bit confusing at first but once you get it configured , the games and movies are wonderful.I got this at a very reasonable price too

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: cesar roger levy
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. I was searching for a TV for my bedroom for quite sometimes until I came across that offer from Amazon. It apparently came on time. I'm very grateful. THere is something that I wish this TV had, and it is one extra HDMI

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed -
Reviews.Author: Roberta Adams "Bobbi Adams"
Reviews.Content: Great reception. Love the LG products! Just right for what we wanted it for. It fits just right into the corner of the room.

Reviews.Title: Good all the way around
Reviews.Author: Suzanne T.
Reviews.Content: Love this LG TV, it's design is attractive and the picture quality is great. I'm glad I made this purchase!

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 32LN520B 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED TV
Reviews.Author: Eustace E. Musgrove "Eustace jr,"
Reviews.Content: Hey, DON'T bother me! I'm STILL enjoying watching it right now. I'll update this after 50,000 hours once the lamp is blown! He-He!

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Shannon K. Madera
Reviews.Content: Was a gift and I couldn't be happier with it, we had an old crummy one the picture and sound are great, just wish it had more in and out puts. But would recommend ....love it....love it!

Reviews.Title: Lightning deal
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, easy set up and auto programming of channels.  LG makes a quality product and our son is pleased with the TV for his own room.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "ts147"
Reviews.Content: lg has best picture quality, the only brand of tv ill ever buy! when paired with lg blu ray player it makes it even easier

Reviews.Title: Lg 42 inch tv.
Reviews.Author: Sarah Gustafson
Reviews.Content: Great tv happy with it so far.  Gave it four out of five because I need more time to see how it functions. This review is not for the 32 inch tv that I did not want but the 42 inch I ordered.

Reviews.Title: Meets All Our Expectations
Reviews.Author: L. Desser
Reviews.Content: The TV provides a good picture and good audio.  It is just big enough to serve a normal-size room.  The set is very light weight, and costs very little in electricity to operate.  It was quite easy to set the TV up.The set did not come with a TV cable that goes from the set to a cable outlet on the wall.  While I had such a cable, I wager many people do not.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV and a great value
Reviews.Author: Mark S Liebman
Reviews.Content: Great TV for my sons room - he plays Xbox on this tv and its very nice.  XXX XXX XXX

Reviews.Title: Looks great as a TV
Reviews.Author: Jonal T Coleman
Reviews.Content: I'm using this as a fourth Monitor on my setup.  It works ok.. Since it's not 1080p everything is a bit larger than expected.  You can adjust the web browser text size by using ctrl + or -. With my 40" Samsung as the 4th monitor i was able to use picture in picture, but this model TV does not support that.  But like i said as a TV it's a good choice, but so so on the Monitor side.

Reviews.Title: Lovely
Reviews.Author: L
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these TV on Black Friday and I love them. I gave my girl one for Christmas and the other I placed on the wall in my bedroom. The picture quality is great also.

Reviews.Title: good cheap tv.
Reviews.Author: Dr. Genao
Reviews.Content: that's a goog low price tv, that offers quality video.that was ideal for my mom that loves watch digital tv.if you are looking a good tv, that's  your choice.

Reviews.Title: The best Christmas present ever!
Reviews.Author: Katy Lake
Reviews.Content: I bought this on Black Friday for my aunt, who has been coveting a flat screen for forever, but was never able to get one herself. I had the LG on my watch list along with several others. I wanted to get her a good TV, from a brand name we'd all actually heard of, but at a good price.On Black Friday, the price for the LG was unbeatable, so my aunt was getting the flat screen of her dreams.My aunt just raved about it, and that was even before my cousin hooked it up for her. The colors are sharp and clear, and the sound is incredible, coming from a little 32" flat screen. She's had no problems figuring out the remote, and it hooked up seamlessly with her dvd player.For the money, it absolutely could not be beat. My aunt (and I!) highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: very good delivery time ahead of what I had been told
Reviews.Author: Fred Cuthbert
Reviews.Content: tv is fine but I had to enlarger the holes on the stand where it fits to the back of the tv as the alignment of two of the holes was off on by half a hole and the screws wouldn't go into the holes!

Reviews.Title: Happy with my new LG TV
Reviews.Author: Cosma rofot
Reviews.Content: So far so good picture is great delivered in one piece and will recommend the LG to everyone.  This is Xmas gift to myself.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: gregory m costalis
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied for the cost of this TV. I have it in my Office. With an HDMI cable the image is great.

Reviews.Title: Great video!
Reviews.Author: amc texas shopper "frugal shopper"
Reviews.Content: replaced a Sony Bravia that was 5 years old, the LED lighting in the LG is superior to the LCD on the Sony. I particular like that the LG takes up a bit less space than the Sony, even with the same screen size, due to smaller frame. I am using a separate speaker system, so I can not attest to the audio quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price and non-techies!
Reviews.Author: sbb
Reviews.Content: I researched quite a bit and LG 32LN530B was on my list when I set out to purchase.  Price was good and tv even better.  Easy to set up - I'm not a techie and set it up!  Played with settings to find best picture and sound.  Only problem is that it is a little slow to respond, i.e. have to press 'on' button on cable remote a few times, pointing it directly at tv, to have it turn on.  Good value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fan
Reviews.Content: I have bought this tv one month ago.It works great.Its shape is beautiful in my home.Its picture is vivid.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Skeezix
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for $150 and I am not at all disappointed. I had expected much less out of it being priced so low, however this baby delivers. Picture is excellent for 720p and the audio is astonishingly good. For anyone complaining about the picture or sound check and make sure the energy saver is off. If you leave it on your TV will automatically adjust to the light in the room; Brighter with more light and darker when there is less illumination. Not completely sure if audio is affected by the energy saver but upon initial use it seemed so. All said and done this TV is a very good buy!

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and picture for bedfroom or garage
Reviews.Author: John Carpenter "johncarp"
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect size for a bedroom and that is why I bought it fro my mother who now lives with us.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for this size TV
Reviews.Author: t.hernandez
Reviews.Content: Super great buy for this television. Fast shipping and picture is great. My daughter so was excited when she was able to hook her Wii with it and watch Netflix and search the internet right from her bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV.
Reviews.Author: Fred Thompson
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this TV, got it to upgrade from a CRT in our RV. I have had it a couple months now. Works great! We have HD through Dish and its really nice. Sound is pretty good too. Picture quality is really nice. i will be getting more LG TV's when I am in the market.

Reviews.Title: its just a good tv
Reviews.Author: mike  O'Leary
Reviews.Content: I just love LG it's not for me I have one it's for my sister for Xmas thanksIt's better than Samsung

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Johnstone
Reviews.Content: Its ok.  I notice a little darkness in the upper left corner.  It is bright and the sound quality is pretty good.  I am using it in a small bedroom and it looks great.  I don't have high def cable hooked to it yet so I cannot comment on picture quality in that aspect.  The xbox does look fantastic.  Would reccomend for the price

Reviews.Title: Its fine but..
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Everything its good, but i can't play videos via USB... dunno why, it only allows me to play pictures and music, if someone knows how to play videos on it please tell.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Order this TV for my girlfriend and she loves it. For the price and size its gets the job done recommend it for anyone if you don't need a big TV and for the price its great.

Reviews.Title: Very good deal
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Very good deal.. Is just a TV with pretty much all what they bring now a days for a very good price. There is really not much else to say.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Kevin McGowan
Reviews.Content: It is great tv love it, and its the perfect size for me. The picture is crystall clear I love it...

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a 55 inch LG and when the time came for a new TV for the bedroom this was an easy decision.  Great TV for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Anthony Lopez
Reviews.Content: For the price, this TV is simply one of the best I have ever owned. LG always delivers great products.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Chris Weimar "CW"
Reviews.Content: I have several Samsung TV's and a Panasonic plasma TV. Wanted to get a slightly larger TV for the bedroom so after looking at the reviews and price I got the 32" LG. Picture quality and sound are both very good, size is perfect. Just as good as my Samsung's or Panasonic and a great buy too!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: grandma D "ggrandma"
Reviews.Content: Like LG electronics.  Have an LG frig and a 47" LG TV in the living room.  Needed bigger TV for the bedroom and this is perfect.  Nice picture.

Reviews.Title: Bought for grandson's dorm
Reviews.Author: Justavet
Reviews.Content: As my grandson was preparing to go off to college he let me know he told his roommate he would bring a TV.  The price and the reviews (and the fact he was limited to 32" screen) led me to the LG.  I purchase a 47" LG for my parents for last Christmas.  I have to say that both TVs look great and the picture quality is as good as, if not better, than my Sony Bravia.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, nice looking, great picture!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Great little TV, especially for the price (I got mine opened box).  I have a lot of LG gear, all of it is solid... would by this TV again for sure!

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: Iris B. Gilman
Reviews.Content: Just hooked up to cable. Light and easy to handle. Wonderful clear picture and 32 is perfect size for my limited TV viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann
Reviews.Content: This TV is just what I wanted. It does the job and it costs much less than the other brands. My son has a larger one with more 'fancy' stuff, but this is fine with me. Best of all, it weighs so little compared to my old Panasonic 'monster.'

Reviews.Title: Clear Screen & Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Williams "MBW"
Reviews.Content: This TV replaced an old outdated one in my parents house. We have many TV's in our house and it was time to upgrade the last one. This TV gives a clear picture and is beautiful. I put this up with the help of a TV stand that swivels and moves out making this TV even more of a hot item. It is easy to use and did I say how clear the picture was :) ? Excellent buy for the price!

Reviews.Title: I am enjoying my LG TV a lot
Reviews.Author: Cats' Caretaker
Reviews.Content: I have been without a TV for several months.  I have been watching the Amazon Prime movies on my iMAC.  I wanted to get them on a bigger screen at a low price.  I decided that I really didn't need the ultra 1080 HD to watch, that I could be satisfied with the upgrade to 720p from my old discarded CRT.  It's just the ticket!

Reviews.Title: Lovin it
Reviews.Author: evon
Reviews.Content: I am lovin this TV so easy to set up and start watching I will be ordering a lager one soon :) great picture and quality the price was the winner for me happy costumer

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tosha Wilson
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our bedroom and we love it.  The color was not very good just out of the box but it just took some adjustments

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Crystal Springs Camp
Reviews.Content: These TVs are very light and easy to work with.  Great picture, and no problems so far. I would buy them again.

Reviews.Title: perfect!!
Reviews.Author: jaime
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons game room and I love it!! I am going to order another one for his  bedroom!!

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Richard C. Flagg II
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up, nice picture and sound, good price. Nice looking, very sharp and sleek. Be sure to read the directions!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Dana M. Pearce
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture, great sound, easy settings.  One reviewer wrote "great tv for a grandma."  Being 77 years old, I agree wholeheartedly.  However, I think it would be a great television for any age.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Yarubi González
Reviews.Content: Me encantó el TV!! everything about the tv its very nice and I recommend it, the size, image and functions are excellent, love it!

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: W. Schwab
Reviews.Content: It's hard to believe that as few as 7-10 years ago, tube TVs were still on the market and going for the same price as what I paid for this unit. Heck, I could have bought three of these TVs for what I spent on my first flat panel--a "monster" 37"--about 7 years ago.LG quality is evident in every aspect of this product. The only thing that gives me a little pause is that I seem to have heard something shifting around a little inside the case as I was lifting the TV onto the wall mount. Don't know what that was about. Otherwise, screen has great resolution, colors, and adaptive brightness. Menu is easy to navigate & settings are easy to understand. There's nothing not to like about this TV. Yes, I could have paid half again as much for a 1080p with Smart features, and I probably would have liked that even better. But this is just a bedroom TV, and it's all I need. I'm saving the bells and whistles for my new family room TV when I get my house renovations done!

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: gonina 85
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great deal especially considering the price. It was easy to set up and the picture and sound are great. I was very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Jason E.
Reviews.Content: We bought this for the bedroom to replace a 19" tv. It was an amazing upgrade! We had compared this LG with others in different stores, and came to the conclusion this tv had the best picture of any of the other 32" tvs. Great tv at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Arrived quickly
Reviews.Author: Ezrina Celestin "aspiring African researcher"
Reviews.Content: The LG 32 inch Tv was easy to setup. A great price. And arrived quickly. It was overall a great deal.

Reviews.Title: No audio jack and minimal ports!
Reviews.Author: JY
Reviews.Content: LG is a great brand, but they have recently really reduced the quality of their entry level TVs in an effort to drive sales to the more expensive models.  A quick internet search shows that this is their budget TV.  As such, they have removed many ports and inputs that you'd find in other TVs.  I was most surprised by the fact that there was no audio output even though on the LG website, this model shows an audio out.There is also only one set of A/V inputs and HDMI.Other than that, this is a standard HDTV, the picture is nice, there is no denying that.  However, in a today's world of connected devices and cable cutters, this TV will not be enough for an entertainment solution.  Of course, this brand may be better than some of the other off brands, but a cheaper Insignia might do just as well of a job and has more ports (Insignia is known to use LG and Samsung panels so the picture quality should be comparable at the same price range).

Reviews.Title: not good-not impressed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV early August of 2013 and it has stopped working about a week ago. It started just turning off and on by itself and has now completely stopped working. I would not encourage anyone to buy. A total disappointment and waste of money as we're unable to return or get a refund.

Reviews.Title: ITS OK!
Reviews.Author: chris hackney
Reviews.Content: had it one day / so far so good . one problem ! cant get rid of 2 inch lines on most channels  on screen . very irritating.

Reviews.Title: Needs more inputs.
Reviews.Author: Steve Fraiser
Reviews.Content: This is a nice unit, but there could have been more inputs installed. Claims to have an RS-232 input, but I couldn't find it. It may be the input labeled 'service only', I don't know. It could have used a computer input so it could be used as a monitor. I'm working on getting a HDMI adapter to try and use for computer use. It could have had 1 more set of 'audio in'and another set of 'composite'. But it is adequate for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Quality Product
Reviews.Author: Marc D. Newman
Reviews.Content: We purchased this as a TV for our bedroom.  The picture quality and color are extremely good.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that if you use the energy savings feature where the brightness is automatically adjusted to the brightness in the room , the picture is too dim and the colors appear to be washed out in artificial light.  This feature can easily be changed to a manual adjustment so it's not really a big deal.  We have have another LG in our entertainment center and it's the same with that one.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Patricia Keeney
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mom, who is not technologically apt. It set up in a half hour, the remote works, picture is great & sound is not bad at all. My mom loves it!

Reviews.Title: great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: jds
Reviews.Content: Converted from an old TV to the LCD. Great picture, and great price. Could not ask for more for the minimal investment.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I read reviews wher they said the sound was muffled, but this thing is LOUD! I keep both my Cable Box low & the TV Low & it's still the Bomb! The Pic is so Clear! I LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: My Dad loves this
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey W. Reich
Reviews.Content: My Dad, who is 87, loves this TV.  It does everything it says it will do.  Great Price.  He enjoys watching golf tournaments on the TV.  Great picture.  Easy set up.  We can watch movies from their laptop very easily.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: ramnik chhibber
Reviews.Content: This TV was the first flat screen we were going to get. (For my son's Xbox the old CRT TV wouldn't work) so i bought this and made a great choice. picture is clear at all angles and my son says the Xbox is full HD. So if you want to get a nice TV for a low price go with this one. The only problem i had was the remote but i soon got used to it after we used it so overall a great TV for a great price.

Reviews.Title: If your going to get a tv this be the one to get.
Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: *****Product Update*****  September 15,2013  Sunday.I've had this tv for a while now and as i was trying to put in my favorite channels,until?I ran into a problem of using the Favorite List no matter what i did on the remote i couldn't get my favorite channels on this list that is until?I started going through the reviews and questions trying to find an answer with out much luck i'm afraid.Even brought up the online owners manual,no help there so i put the owners manual soft ware disc that came with this tv into my pc drive,bingo i found the answer i was looking for.On the disc a whole hell of a lot more shown and more complete than anything else.I think that you will find everything you want to know about this tv on this disc.The secret to using the Favorite List is:Q.MENU button on right side of remote,2nd button down from Channel Page.Go down to Del/Add/Fav,use the right arrow to get to Favorite,hit OK on the remote now that channel is in your Favorite List,go up to the FAV button to confirm.So this is extremely easy to program your channels,i manually put in my favorite channels,so i'm happy now.Love this awesome tv with it's Channel List and Favorite List also the Flashback button,very handy.On with the review.This is my very first 32" thin and lite tv.I bought this because of the 5 star rating from a lot of people,usually when i buy something from Amazon this is what i go by.This comes with a thin cellophane protector that covers the border around the tv also the stand,screen is not covered so you have to be careful,they recommend to not peel this off,not sure why.This tv lights up a Red Hue under the LG logo,when off.Very easy to setup and program your tastes in and very well protected and packaged.For On Screen Inputs : TV-HDMI1-AV-COMPONENT-HDMI2Came UPS in 2 Days in a very long pre-printed box and taped secure from Plainfield,IN.It's a shame that LG didn't include a HDMI Cable with this tv,luckily i had a spare to use.When i first turned on this set i got a black screen after my connections were hooked up and i thought now what?So i went to the remote and pressed Input,Initial Setting Screen came up,this is where you put in your location info among other things.Once i set it up then i programmed and fine-tuned the picture and sound.Speakers on this actually sound good,oh and the owner's manual very easy to read and understand 31 pages all in English.Everything is all layed out for you in packaging matching up with the manual.You even get the two AAA batteries that power the remote.The software disc has the owner's manual on it just in case something happens to the paper one.If you have this on Auto Picture everything adjusts itself,i didn't care for that and so i set it the way i want to view and listen to it.I like this tv very much and would wholeheartedly recommend the LG series tv's,especially this one.

Reviews.Title: THIS HAS NO HEADPHONE JACK!!!
Reviews.Author: Justin M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I am in Afghanistan and the products specs on the LG website clearly states that it has headphone jacks.  Amazon should be more careful about describing the products it sells.

Reviews.Title: Faulty and Cheaply made product under the guise of a good brand name.
Reviews.Author: Jack Leyland
Reviews.Content: Do not buy an LG TV. Just don't do it. I bought this hoping that since LG is a generally a well regarded brand, I would not have to worry about cheap build quality and faulty circuit. I was horribly mistaken. I even recently discovered that there is a class action lawsuit filed against LG right now for producing TVs that break long before their period of expected functional use, which is exactly what happened to mine. I bought it refurbished, but it was still only a year old, but despite this the display failed to work for more than 10 minutes at a time. At first, it wouldn't even turn on at all. After a few slaps and bumps it flickered on, only to turn back on by itself ten minutes into a movie. I tried everything. I even opened it up to check the capacitors and connections but found nothing that could be fixed without paying for a repair. There is no excuse for such a worthless product, and it's even more inexcusable that the problem I was experiencing is very common and well documented in LG tvs. All I had to do was google the symptoms to discover the lawsuit filed and that there was in fact no free solution or any effort on the company's part to do anything about it. Lucky for me I could return it, but for those whose TV abruptly stops working right after the warranty expires, there is nothing they can do.Do yourself a favor, buy a Sony.

Reviews.Title: Never worked
Reviews.Author: kimberly martin
Reviews.Content: Bought this in September for my granddaughter for Christmas . Never worked!!!! And too late to return ! There goes  over two hundred dollars out the window! Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: I measured my location, it should have fit, but.............
Reviews.Author: Michael Trump "electrified"
Reviews.Content: Seems like a really good TV, but the measurements shown are just a little off, enough that it would not fit in the small space I have for a TV in my travel trailer. The size in Amazon‘s website description (29.1 x 17.2 x 3.1, Inches) is not correct, the 17.2 inches is actually nearly 18 inches. It’s taller due to the protrusion at center of bottom of the TV (if you look close you can see this in one or two of the pictures). Amazon's height measurement is accurate at sides but does not include this center protrusion. This difference was enough (about ½ inch) to make it not fit in the small space I have.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great pricing.  Thanks
Reviews.Author: David A. Knapp "David"
Reviews.Content: Great pricing, quick shipping, much cheaper than local suppliers.  No complaint at all with quality of product.  Thank you very much for a good quality product at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Poor Product
Reviews.Author: Eureka Aderemi
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item(LG 32 inch flat screen) only  a few months ago, it is behaving like christmas lights, going off by itself every minute, i am so disappointed i can't believe after spending so much...that i will not enjoy my money.

Reviews.Title: very good investment
Reviews.Author: ANTONIO MILLAN
Reviews.Content: very good investment for the product you received, as it has a great picture and good sound, apart from that very light and can be placed with a base wall Extensible smoothly.

Reviews.Title: Good picture and sound.
Reviews.Author: dean phillips
Reviews.Content: Now if Comcast would get its act together, all would be well with the world. Too much to ask for.

Reviews.Title: Super tv for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Kelbaugh "voorheeskids"
Reviews.Content: I replaced some tv's in a rental property with this LG model, great picture and great price, I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: love my item
Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: I gave this item 5 stars because a different reasons. One being that the item showed up on time (which was amazing speed.) The TV was in perfect condition when it arrived.  It was a gift and my fiance loves it :)

Reviews.Title: Great  Purchase
Reviews.Author: Barry
Reviews.Content: This great t,v, for price & for what  I needed for bedrm which fits nice .I recommend buying product ....

Reviews.Title: Terrible product! LG WHAT happened???
Reviews.Author: C. Petersen
Reviews.Content: Had this 6 months and only watched it a couple of hours a month at the most and it completely quit working! LG used to be a reputable product.  Not anymore.  I have a VIsio in my living room we watch daily and it has lasted us a couple of years. Don't waste your money and I won't buy LG again.

Reviews.Title: i love my tv..
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my LG tv. It fits perfect in my room I will  continue to by more in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great TV/Value
Reviews.Author: Robert Allen
Reviews.Content: The only fault is only 1 HDMI input.  You need to add an adapter for more HDMI inputs.  I have a need for for cable HDMI  and BlueRay DVD input.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Straight answers! "Rick"
Reviews.Content: The TV works very well. The picture of course is not going to be super clear as it's only 720p, but it is a very good picture. It is a nice looking TV frame wise also, as the bezel is small and almost seamlessly blends in with the screen. For the price you can't go wrong. menu is easy to use, and has plenty of color, screen adjustments. Very pleased so far.

Reviews.Title: NIce picture for the price point.
Reviews.Author: AZHOTROD
Reviews.Content: Only one HDMI output and nothing to indicate when unit is powered on. Otherwise, this is a decent buy. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Yeah is really damn good xD
Reviews.Author: Luis miguel
Reviews.Content: Well i buy this tv and is really good i like it :D Yo usualmente juego muchos videojuegos y este tv tiene graficos muy realistas

Reviews.Title: Good value.
Reviews.Author: MnBoy "Retiree"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, nice sound for a good price. Easy set up.  The  VESA is 100 x 200mm so watch this and make sure you buy the right mounting system.

Reviews.Title: Nice set
Reviews.Author: new pet owner
Reviews.Content: Decent all-around, nice picture...works fine...easy menus to change settings etc. (& I am not savvy) Screen is larger than I anticipated because of the width,but no complaints.The only regret I have is not considering a wi-fi smart tv, but I may do that through a new blu-ray player.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Taylor
Reviews.Content: Got it for my little sister, its the same size as my tv but newer and lighter, shes happy with it so I am too.50 dollars less than Walmart and she got it the next day. 1080p and 720p aint much noticeable difference.

Reviews.Title: For my tenant
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: Bought this on a steal sale for my tenant downstairs and i've watched it to test it out and the picture quality is perfect.  It's a bit too saturated but that can be fixed.  Has been working great and while it's not the flashiest specs, it servs its purpose for very little money.

Reviews.Title: Greatest TV
Reviews.Author: Preston Bejabeng
Reviews.Content: This is definitely the greatest television I have purchased. Not only is it at a great price but the quality is unbeatable. Besides the amazing picture, what sets this TV apart are the incredible speakers it comes with. No other TV of this size that I have purchased has had speakers this nice. Definitely worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: TV for Home Office
Reviews.Author: CeltDad
Reviews.Content: Great TV for small home office.  Picture is great, sound is above average.  I need seven more words for this.

Reviews.Title: Plastic face scratched up
Reviews.Author: Harold I.
Reviews.Content: The plastic face on the front of the TV(not the screen) was all scratched up. I expected better from a refurbished item. I have bought plenty of other refurbished items that were in much better shape. I guess you get what you pay for. The picture is good, though.

Reviews.Title: I like!!!
Reviews.Author: Karen Robinson
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my son's room and it works great, Perfect size . No problems at all. ( yet )

Reviews.Title: An awesome, inexpensive TV with one big letdown.
Reviews.Author: MacEducator
Reviews.Content: An awesome, inexpensive TV with one big letdown. The picture is much sharper then I expected and makes my cheap non HD cable package look great. Response is great for a low spec TV and the contrast and lighting is good as well. It was easy to setup and the ports on the back, and side, are easy to access. It is also a nice surprise to have physical buttons that can be used. The letdown is that it does not have a standard analog audio out (headphone port) and supports digital audio out only. Due to this I was ready to return it, but the sound from the built in speakers is decent, and the rest of the TV is so awesome, I will use it as is.You can get an adapter to convert the digital audio to analog for about $35, this requires another plug to power and more cables, etc. My rationale is that this is a basic, low cost TV, so why would LG assume the buyer would have hi end audio. A buyer with a hi end audio system would likely buy a much more expensive TV.So, if this had an earphone port, so I could use my 2.1 speakers system, I would give it 5 stars.  But I would not buy it again because of no headphone jack.

Reviews.Title: LG is the ONLY brand for me
Reviews.Author: Bobster
Reviews.Content: After purchasing several LG products - 2 TVs and a Blu Ray player - I am sold.  They make a quality product that is reliable and gets a fantastic picture!

Reviews.Title: Amazon Warehouse let me down.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Skotzke
Reviews.Content: I've purchased items through the Amazon Warehouse route previously...with excellent results.  Bought a 46" Panasonic TV for the basement that has worked flawlessly.  So I thought I'd try again.Purchased the LG LN530B as a Christmas gift for my college daughter.  Item arrived double-boxed with box boxes in fine shape.The TV was trouble from the moment we plugged it in.  Sometimes would not turn on, other times would turn off randomly.  She was VERY disappointed, and we were forced to return the TV.  Received a full refund, including shipping but the experience has turned me off to the Amazon Warehouse option.We purchased the same TV direct from Amazon, new for $10 more after Christmas.  No issues with the new set...but a slightly bitter taste in my mouth from the experience.

Reviews.Title: Submit
Reviews.Author: Archie and Sue
Reviews.Content: The instruction manual was not very complete. The most I can do is to turn in on and off. I have called two times and can't get the help I need. I am not pleased with the LG  system.  Archie Naugle

Reviews.Title: Dead On Arrival
Reviews.Author: BigChocolate
Reviews.Content: So I get my delivery today, 05/20/2014. The first thing I notice is a big gash in the box, so obviously I am hoping the TV is ok.  The right side of the screen is fractured and looks like a spider web.  Not very happy about this at the moment and I am waiting to see if Amazon stands behind their replacement policy.

Reviews.Title: Beware of Warehouse Deals, Inc
Reviews.Author: Mac
Reviews.Content: Purchased an LG Electronics 32” TV from Amazon.com and sold through Warehouse Deals, Inc.  as a Christmas present for my daughter.  The package arrived with no apparent damage to the shipping box.  She was not ready to install/mount the TV at the time, so left it undisturbed in the unopened box.  When I recently went down to install her TV I opened the box to find that the screen had been shattered.  All packing materials were intact and no damage to the box.  I did notice, however, that the screen did not have the contact plastic cellophane on the screen typically associated with flat screen tv’s.The return window had already passed by the time I found out the unit was damaged, so a learning experience for me.  I did, however, find out that this is not an uncommon occurrence for items sold through Warehouse Deals, Inc.  Many complaints about their products on the internet.  Disappointing to find out that Amazon not only does business with them, but owns the company.

Reviews.Title: fast shipment
Reviews.Author: jorge
Reviews.Content: very happy with the product•Do explain why you liked or disliked this product.•Do compare to similar products and share how long you've used this product.•Do identify specific attributes (e.g. comfort & fit of a shirt or the battery life of a camera) and whether they met your expectations.•Don't describe your seller or shipping experience (you can do that at amazon.com/feedback).•Don't include promotional content of any kind or reviews written in exchange for compensation.

Reviews.Title: HDMi ports don't work without extra equipment.
Reviews.Author: Fareedah Shayeb
Reviews.Content: I HAD TO BUY A ENTIRELY DIFFERENT BRAND BECAUSE I WENT THROUGH 2 OF THESE TELEVISIONS AND TECH SUPPORT THROUGH AMAZON AND LG COULDN'T FIX THE PROBLEM OF  THE HDMI PORTS. THE TV ITSELF WORKS FINE BUT I REALLY LIKE TO HOOK MY COMPUTER UP TO MY TELEVISION AND COULDN'T SO IT WASN'T A SOUND INVESTMENT FOR ME PERSONALLY

Reviews.Title: Missing three screws and Amazon was not helpful to get them
Reviews.Author: JoanneTheDissatisfied
Reviews.Content: I still have this TV jerry rigged because it was so difficult to get the missing screws through Amazon.  They just brushed me off to LG, which was a pain to navigate through their system so I gave up and am using one screw to hold it together.  Hope it does not break and smash this nice TV.  Give me a break!

Reviews.Title: Mixed review
Reviews.Author: vIVIAN  LOWELL
Reviews.Content: I am having trouble getting used to the wider screen.  It distorts all the shapes, especially people. Color is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great price but questionable quality
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Bruns
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv because of its price & specs. LG has a reputation of being a decent company but, 3 weeks after getting our tv it failed. Amazon replaced the tv for free & we are a month in on the replacement. Well see how it holds up.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: Jack R "The Cat"
Reviews.Content: This is not for someone needing all the latest features. It does have a good picture in high def but regular TV broadcasts even on cable are nothing to write home about. They were only $240.00, I needed two. I also have high end 46" LG smart TV's and they are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: plus
Reviews.Author: Micheal
Reviews.Content: Its a nicr tv and I got itin a reasonable amount of time even with super savings it took 3days. Happy thumbs up

Reviews.Title: OK Television, but Just Couldn't Get Things To Display Properly ...
Reviews.Author: Timothy S. Shropshire "'rangsmith"
Reviews.Content: Yeah, we had to send this one back (thank you return policy!)For some strange reason we never could get this television to communicate properly with all of our boxes in regard to screen ratios and presentation (?)

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics TV
Reviews.Author: Katharine Stone
Reviews.Content: I knew the screws to hold the tv to the stand were not entirely stable.  But I didn't know that, when my cat brushed up against it, it would crash to the floor and be destroyed.  The tv was good; the stand is not.  Next tv I get will be wall-mounted.

Reviews.Title: Decent picture for the price
Reviews.Author: The Gatherer
Reviews.Content: Good quality and serves the purpose. Is in a small space in our apartment although the quality is not has high as other TVs we've owned.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: IAIN
Reviews.Content: This TV was a great buy. The price and the specs speak for themselves and it looks way better in person than on Amazon. So far I haven't encountered any problems but I got a 3 year Square Trade warranty just in case (for around $30 its worth it). I just use it as a gaming TV for my bedroom and it does its job very well. The only reason im not giving this product 5 stars is my order got delayed by more than a week.

Reviews.Title: OK TV, Sound not wonderful
Reviews.Author: Joanne R. Merola "Joanne R"
Reviews.Content: Nice TV, price was great; sound isn't all that wonderful, a bit "thin" and "tinny" and not at all deep and rich.  I suppose that's what you can expect for the price.

Reviews.Title: LN530B
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: It looks and sounds fine. Lot's of sound and picture adjusting available, but was good out of the box.  Does anyone know how to set the volume when setting the TV to turn on automatically?  I like it turning on when I get up, but it resets the volume so it's way too loud.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: Tre'Jonz J.
Reviews.Content: had to take the hole tv apart and put it back together because the tv was going on and off for some reason. then i found a 39" tv from Walmart new and could paid 30 more $.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Judy Spiller
Reviews.Content: Always LG more than met our needs. We actually bought two. I would recommend LG for anyone who needs an economical tv.

Reviews.Title: Good luck finding a wall mount for this TV.
Reviews.Author: HaveBrain.WillThink
Reviews.Content: The quality of the TV is average but finding a mount is almost impossible. The back of the TV has numerous obstructions that limit the attachment of most mounts.Also I see some bright spots on the screen  when it should be dark.  Not so much that it's ruining  the viewing but a surprise for what was expected from LG.

Reviews.Title: it was damaged
Reviews.Author: cvaldiviesob
Reviews.Content: i'm very disapointed with this product not for the quality of it per se, it was broken since the moment i got it

Reviews.Title: Broken!
Reviews.Author: margaret euhus
Reviews.Content: I ordered this in Oct for a Christmas gift, I did not open it and plug it in and hook up an xbox to it to make sure it would work, I should be able to assume that it would. Well, my son hooked it up and guess what, it does not work. I can't return it because it's been more than 30 days. I will not buy electronics from amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Budget TV
Reviews.Author: coke
Reviews.Content: The picture was not to the quality I expected. I couldn't remedy this thru changing the picture settings. The high rating this product reviewed misled me. The price is very good though.

Reviews.Title: good, but could be better
Reviews.Author: patrick
Reviews.Content: I have owned several LG products in the past, and have never had much luck with them. The colors on this TV seem dull in comparison to my laptop's monitor. I also noticed that some of the inputs are grayed out when there are devices connected, and that the CEC function doesn't work with PS3 like it did with Vizio TVs. other than that, I am glad to finally have a flat screen TV in my unit. the previous tv I was using was an ilo sdtv!

Reviews.Title: Mostly great, except for the glaring flaw...
Reviews.Author: Tj
Reviews.Content: It's got a beautiful screen, the energy efficiency is attractive, and you can't hook it up your stereo without shenanigans. Every TV I've ever owned before had an audio out and it's quite useful for hooking things up to your surround sound system. Golly gee, I guess I'll only knock 2 stars off for that since it's my small bedroom TV and the stereo is a bit superfluous... I read the top few ratings - not enough I guess. Okay, so on to the shenanigans: hook the audio from your things (dvd players, what have you) to the stereo and only send the video to the TV. I'll let you figure out how you'd like to do that... buh.

Reviews.Title: No usb video player
Reviews.Author: julioctorresg
Reviews.Content: within the content playback options, as well as the visualization of photos and music, as other models should include video playback at least the most known formats, a real shame.

Reviews.Title: The replacement has the same issue.
Reviews.Author: Marvin
Reviews.Content: After my first review I recieved an email, I would like to say that I'm happy but not really. But I was asked to write a positive review. So swallowing my pride here it is. (positive thoughts) For smaller hands this would be a phenominal mouse. If your not concerned about gaming it's awesome. The company tried to make it right. This was a gift so, the employees did what they could to rectify the problem. I can't do this I have to much pride and feel bad that this was a present. The breathing issue is still there. Still can't use the #6 button for anything. I I have disabled the "breathing function" and yet when I restart my system, there it is. The dpi settings won't stay as set. I waited another 3 weeks to write another review for this mouse. Same issues. I counted the wrong buttons in my first review, the 6 button, sorry my bad. The macro's don't record right. So my conclusion is that: The Software for this product has to be completely redone. A little tip, just like the release of DayZ standalone, Have the people that use it TEST it. Oh and test the mouse on somebody that has bigger hands. My hand spread is from bottom of palm to tip of middle finger 8 inches by 4" palm. In the future test it more than on smaller hands.  Sorry that I couldn't boost the rating, I have to much pride.

Reviews.Title: Hassles to set up as monitor.
Reviews.Author: todd t.
Reviews.Content: I bought this under the assumption that this would work to replace my other 32" monitor.  It didn't hook up without having to purchase special cables and having to go into my internal setting for my computer to set this up.  I  would have to bring my system in to have this done and cost more than I had intended to spend so I returned it.  Too much extra expense.

Reviews.Title: **** Warning ***** LG Products from past exp are not reliable!!
Reviews.Author: Puddy_Tat "Tat"
Reviews.Content: Hello all,From past Experience with the LG TV product line their quality is poor at best and the durability is none existent. When you have an issue you get lead around in circles by their support teams blaming everything else but their hardware! And when proven to be their issue they do not honor their warranty!!!I simply would not trust buying LG TV's due to their overall quality.Over Seas support who you can't understand that doesn't know how to support their hardware.Inability to take responsibility for their poor workmanship.If you buy a LG TV be prepared for a fight and if you are outside the 30-day return policy if you have ANY ISSUE!!!

Reviews.Title: Bad choice for me
Reviews.Author: troy robinson
Reviews.Content: The default settings are dark side.The remote settings are confusing and time consuming.Wished I had picked another TV.

Reviews.Title: To small for me
Reviews.Author: DE STAERKE
Reviews.Content: When I received it I was very disappointed because the shape makes it smaller than I thought. This TV is too small for a living room, order it only for very small rooms.

Reviews.Title: We send me the diferente model of tv
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL GOMEZ
Reviews.Content: I buy LG LED 32 and They send me TV Sony  bravia 32", this it not my order. And now is impossible change it. I don t like your services because don't comply with my expectations
